name: Rim Yoseph
text: Shannon did a phenomenal job with our wedding photos! She was receptive to our ideas, was incredibly responsive, and recommended a beautiful location by the beach where we had our ceremony. Shannon is also incredibly knowledgeable about the area and she also gave us suggestions of day trips in nearby cities that really enriched our trip. I cannot recommend Shannon enough!

name: A Marie
text: Shannon did a fantastic job at our wedding on Valentine's Day. She understood how I wanted to capture our ceremony, patiently gave me all the shots I wanted and she did a great job editing the final prints. She's worth every penny! Highly recommend !

name: Megan Simmons
text: Shannon did a wonderful job photographing our wedding. My husband explained what he was looking for and she took his ideas and made them a reality. She was patient and professional. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for professional pictures.

name: Maddy
text: Shannon is a great choice to photograph your special occasion.  We used her for our wedding, maternity, and newborns!  We are very happy with her work!

name: K R DePorter
text:
This was our first time ever being professionally photographed and Shannon surpassed ALL of our expectations.  She is incredibly passionate about what she does. She is extremely down to earth and makes you feel very comfortable.  She captured some really beautiful moments and we are so so pleased with the results.
Shannon is very flexible.  She was more than willing to reschedule/add more time for inclement weather, etc.
I would highly recommend Shannon for all of your photography needs and events! <3 <3

name: Valerie Monismith
text: June 2021. I hired Shannon to do family photos on the beach as well as wedding photos on the beach for my oldest son. We had a great afternoon with Shannon.  She was so easy going, and calm throughout the process.  We have a large family.  Along with our 5 children and their significant others we also had grandchildren, my mom and brother and friends as well as the brides mom and sister.  Shannon worked in separate family shots for all who were there as well as full family shots, wedding shots and it all went very smoothly and was a lot of fun.  We wanted these to be casual and for it to be a fun event and that is what it was with Shannon.  She was such a nice person and great with the kids.  We received all of  our photos within 7 weeks which is great.  With wedding photos and especially with as many shots as Shannon took this is well within the normal 2 month time frame most photographers have in their contract.  We had a great experience with Shanmon from start to finish with good communication along the way.  Highly recommend.

name: Genny Dubus
text: Very professional and very patient. We loved the photos.

name: Adrienne Gustin
text: Amazing, could not have asked for a more down to earth person to take our photos. It was quite the day but glad the weather was amazing and she captured our moment perfectly.. We even took pictures another day with her and I couldn't he happier. Thank you again!!

name: Isabela Oliveros
text: My whole family loved her pictures. Not only is the final result stunning but she made us all feel comfortable at the wedding photoshoot. Great work!!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alma Meza
text: Shannon is one talented women, the pictures she took for my God-daughters wedding in Florida were amazing, we enjoyed her company during the whole wedding. Thank you Shannon for your amazing work. I will most definitely recommend your awesome work.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: L. Wise
text: We loved our pics taken by Shannon! She was so much fun!!! We had a beach wedding ceremony in Navarre, Florida! We really appreciate the services while we were so far from home!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori.  It was my pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to hear from you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Paris Bryant
text: I was a bridesmaid in my best friend Brittney's wedding and it was a disgrace to watch the photographer not do what she was paid to do.  While getting dressed she spent more time taking pictures of the wedding rings than of the girls and the bride. After the ceremony she kept asking what kind of poses we wanted to do instead of being creative and telling us. During the reception she walked around smoking, at the bar, fixing a to go plate which were plenty of real plates because we were at a nice restaurant (she just chose to grab a to go plate because she wanted food to go, so you a lie!) and eating off the kids buffet (which was for children 12 and under only, you wrote it yourself). She didn't even get any pictures of the bride and father dance, none of the wedding favor's table, or food table.  All those pictures came from family who took their own pictures and sent it to the bride. The bride was very upset because of the money she spent to capture her one and only wedding day and to be told that most of the pictures were destroyed only after she kept hassling the photographer for months. Nothing was destroyed, she just realized that she was doing more eating, smoking and drinking and didn't have enough pictures.  Thank god family and friends were there to help capture the moments.  I would not lie about any of this...God knows everything i have written is all true! I guess she's picking how great she is with different brides because she was not great at all. If you take your business seriously, treat everyone the same because all money spends the same.

name: TC McNeil Shepherd
text: Shannon's work is unparalleled. Her passion shines through, and her attention to detail creates such a romantic feel. I highly recommend her!

name: Dede Dase
text: Shannon was a true gem for our wedding pictures.  She was able to meet all of our requests - pictures on our Vespa, helped us move our arbor, and amazing sunset pictures!  I am certain we will be having anniversary pictures done by her!

name: Heather Stewart
text: Shannon is one of the best photographers I’ve ever used for an event!!!  We had the perfect weather for a beach wedding and the pictures or absolutely gorgeous.   Thank you Shannon!

resp.text: It was an absolute pleasure, Heather.  Thank you so much for allowing me to capture one of the most important days of your life!

name: Taylor A
text: We had an absolutely wonderful experience with Shannonography! She is very professional, had amazing pose ideas, and every shot in our gallery is stunning! 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Taylor.  You and Michael were so awesome to work with.  I still can't get over the photos we got.  I love them so much!

name: Brittney Alexander
text: Worst experience ever! If you want all of your wedding photos DO NOT book her! She is so unprofessional and you will not receive all of your photos! She lied several times as to when my gallery would be completed and then when she did upload it she had the nerve to send me an email telling me she lost some of my pictures due to a memory card malfunction! I have maybe 5 good wedding pictures I’m proud to show! Your wedding is one of the most important days of your life and can’t be redone! Please save yourself the heartache, pain, or lawsuit! I wish someone would of warned me! And not to mention..she ate more food then any of my guest did at my wedding instead of taking pictures like she should of! She also was at the bar and took a “to go” plate! Just so damn unprofessional! I have no first dance pics, father/daughter dance pics, no pics of my cake/decor! No good wedding party pics, first kiss pics...just NOTHING! I reached out to someone else who’s wedding she photographed and they had the exact same complaints!

name: Lexi Dettelbach
text: I was the bride and found her on google, saw pictures and thought she did a good job. She also had her daughter "work" as a photographer too but she didn't actually do anything. While we were all getting ready she spent more time taking pictures of the rings, my shoes, the dress and makeup tray than my actual wedding party and myself. Then, she decided to invite her daughter, daughter's boyfriend and granddaughter up to my reception and eat (crab, steak....). Her daughter got so drunk (she's like 26 ) and she was all over my 15 year old nephew, it was disgusting behavior. She didn't even get me walking out where they introduced us as husband and wife. I got the pictures back and I was very disappointed.  The pictures were off centered and she didn't tell me to do any poses, I had to come up with everything. All in all, not professional in my opinion.

name: Stefani Chavez
text: Shannon’s photos are absolutely stunning. She has a unique artistic perspective that makes what she captures superior to what I see from other photographers. I highly recommend her! Our family photos are always celebrity quality for a really fair price ❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stefani.  It is always a pleasure to photograph your family.  I especially love getting to capture your beautiful children year after year.  They are so cuuuuute!

name: Duke Ofearl
text: Shannon photographed our Navarre Beach destination wedding in March and went above and beyond. Very professional.  We especially loved the detail and bride and groom images.  Due to weather issues, we didn't think we were going to be able to do our couple and wedding party pics on the beach like we hoped, but Shannon stayed positive and focused on getting some other pics first and then she drove back with us from the reception site to make sure we got the pics we dre!med of.  I couldn't be happier.  She also offered our family and guests a discounted rate for family pics while we we were in town.  We plan on coming back in a few months, as we just found out we are expecting and want her to capture the start of our family.  If we can, we plan on coming back every year and doing family pics.  She still offers the discount even though our wedding was in March.  I highly recommend her.  Great prices too!

resp.text:
Hi, Dan & Morgan.  Omg!  Congratulations!!  Wow.  I can't wait.  I know you both have to be so excited.  Isn't that what your Mom was teasing you about, Morgan.  haha

Your wedding was perfect.  Your families were amazing.  Thank you both so much for making me feel like part of the crew and being willing to do what it takes to get the perfect image.  My favorite has to be when you both laid in the sand for the most amazing shot EVER.  That had better be going on a canvas!  I had a blast with the wedding party images too.  Your friends were hysterical.  I told you we would have a perfect sunset.  It was definitely worth the drive back.

I am so happy for you both and can't wait to meet the little one!  <3  Woo hoo!

name: Kellie Tubb
text: Shannon is on time, professional and a little quirky!  Everytime we go to the beach she is available for pictures.  Wouldn't use anyone else!

name: Melika Brown
text: Shannon was very easy to work with and did a great job capturing our destination wedding in Destin, FL. The pictures are of great quality, highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Melika.  You and Gerald are one of my favorite couples from 2018.  Watching the love you share and watching the love of your families touched me so much.  I am so happy for you both and hope to see you again when you are in town.  May 2019 be your best year yet!

text: I hired Shannon to photograph my wedding in Destin and I couldn't be happier.  She kept in touch with us from the time we hired her to the day we received our images -  making the entire experience so much easier than I ever imagined! She listened and helped us get the images we wanted without all the stress. I highly recommend her - images are spectacular!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mely.  It was a pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to see you again.

name: WhiteTigerAudio
text: Thanks for the quick session, the pictures look amazing!

name: Mel B

resp.text: Thank you, Mel.  I had so much fun photographing your engagement photos.  You and Rob were incredible.  I love sessions at the jettys in Destin.  It definitely doesn't look like any other beach in the area.  I look forward to photographing your wedding in the Spring.  Can't wait!

name: Ana Mmba19202016
text: Greaat experience! Shannonography did our family pictures, very proffessional, right on time and she manage to do exactly what we wanted

resp.text: Hi, Ana.  It was a pleasure.  Thank you so much for allowing me to capture your family vacation.  Your kids were so cute!  The next time you come to Pensacola Beach make sure to reach out.  <3

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: Melika Brown
text: Shannon was very easy to work with and did a great job capturing our destination wedding in Destin, FL. The pictures are of great quality, highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Melika.  You and Gerald are one of my favorite couples from 2018.  Watching the love you share and watching the love of your families touched me so much.  I am so happy for you both and hope to see you again when you are in town.  May 2019 be your best year yet!

name: lets not do this lol id rather not
text: I hired Shannon to photograph my wedding in Destin and I couldn't be happier.  She kept in touch with us from the time we hired her to the day we received our images -  making the entire experience so much easier than I ever imagined! She listened and helped us get the images we wanted without all the stress. I highly recommend her - images are spectacular!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Traci.  You were an absolutely stunning bride and so easy to work with.

name: Melissa Meza
text: Shannon went above and beyond to capture my destination wedding! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mely.  It was a pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to see you again.

name: Kristen Bryant
text: Shannon is amazing in the way she captures special moments! Her photos are the best.

name: April Molina
text: Great photography! I’ve gotten photos done with Shannon many times , she always has amazing an unique ideas the photos always come out perfect ! She works well in many environments and did awesome with my kids ! She has done family sessions for me as well as personal session to help build a modeling portfolio for myself.  I also did a bestie shoot with my best friend and they were amazing . I love how she’s open to many things an doesn’t limit her business to strictly one kind of photography. I would recommend her to anyone looking for a personable photographer. Very professional and the editing is always great ! She’s is always my number one choice for photography in Pensacola and surrounding areas ❤️ If your looking for a wonderful expirence I’d recommend going through Shannon. Thanks Shannon for all my wonderful photos.

name: WhiteTigerAudio
text: Thanks for the quick session, the pictures look amazing!

name: Mel B
text: Shannon is an amazing photographer!!! Absolutely love her work!

resp.text: Thank you, Mel.  I had so much fun photographing your engagement photos.  You and Rob were incredible.  I love sessions at the jettys in Destin.  It definitely doesn't look like any other beach in the area.  I look forward to photographing your wedding in the Spring.  Can't wait!

name: Ana Mmba19202016
text: Greaat experience! Shannonography did our family pictures, very proffessional, right on time and she manage to do exactly what we wanted

resp.text: Hi, Ana.  It was a pleasure.  Thank you so much for allowing me to capture your family vacation.  Your kids were so cute!  The next time you come to Pensacola Beach make sure to reach out.  <3

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

name: Diane Lader
text: We had our 35 yr high school reunion here and it was perfect!  Plenty of parking, definitely large enough to accommodate a large group of people. And you can’t ask for a more beautiful area.

name: Aleem Gillani
text: Nice place. Good enough venue. Pretty setup. Problem is poor acoustics in the barn due to hard surfaces on floor, walls and ceiling. Good band was made to sound bad due to the acoustics.

name: Bocephus (Nate Dawg)
text: Awesome wedding venue for all those lovebirds!!!

name: Jeff McKelvey
text: Kylee Cooper Farms is the perfect wedding venue. Especially if you're looking for an outside wedding venue that has inside options. It's rustic and country, yet can be transformed into elegant. My daughter had a wedding shower here and it was great and we booked her wedding as well. This place is nice for people who live in the Lake Martin or Central Alabama area. The owners are really professional and friendly. Highly Recommended.

name: Teresa McKelvey
text: The space is absolutely beautiful and they had everything there we needed. Tables, chairs, linens, and a beautiful setting. We hosted a bridal shower there and it was amazing.

name: Shelley Kim
text:
It was such a pleasure hearing DJ Billy Ferguson!  Growing up with a dad who's a musician, I was exposed to, and have an appreciation of, the older generation's music as well as every genre of music out there.

Billy, being so humble, surprised me with his extensive knowledge of these genres from old classics to country to hip-hop!  Ask him for ANY song and he'll pull it up in a second.

He's an excellent MC - a natural - and is an asset to any event because he loves what he does, he's been doing it for ever, and can blend into whatever role you need him to play.

I can't wait for my daughter to get married so more people can get to experience him as I have.

name: Lana Grier
text: I highly recommend Hubcap Classics with Billy Ferguson when looking for disk jockey.  Mr. Ferguson has provided entertainment at multiple events I have attended through the years. He has awesome sense of humor and access to every song you could imagine.  He is definitely a crowd-pleaser and keeps the party lively!

name: james worrell
text: D j had excellent communication skills

name: Burnette Plumbing
text: Great customer service

name: Benjamin Ellis
text: Idk

name: Barbara Garcia
text: JustMarriedBox did a great job setting up our room on our wedding night! We were pleasantly surprised to see how beautiful, simple and elegant the set up was. We ordered the deluxe box and it was an excellent choice. The box had absolutely everything one would need on wedding night. We were so grateful for the snacks, energy drinks, Tylenol and everything else! You must hire them to see for yourself! We highly recommend using their services.

resp.text: Barbara, We’re so glad that you and Frank enjoyed Just Married Box services for your wedding night. We pray that you marriage is filled with endless bliss!

name: Collin Robinson
text:
So much fun! DJ Platinum had our entire wedding dancing for almost 2 hours. He played a very good mixture of popular and catchy songs for everyone to enjoy.

Once the playlists my wife and I sent him ran out, he seamlessly played his own mix and had a good time with it.

Brian Robinson (not related) MCd and he was very professional and fun too!

The photo booth was a huge hit, and the pictures it printed were a nice touch. Plenty of friends and family left with 2 or 3 photos in their hands.

I highly recommend Platinum Entertainment DJ to anyone in the Birmingham, AL area!

name: Rolanda Hammond
text: DJ Platinum provided great music and all around EXCELLENT service for my company's 2 day event! I highly recommend him for all of your functions!

name: kim russell
text: DJ Platinum did a great job with our wedding! He turned our wedding reception into a huge party! I had a great time working with Platinum Entertainment. They are very professional and the online client site made it very easy to customize the music for my wedding.

name: Teddy Rachel
text: We had an absolutely great experience with platinum entertainment! We had DJ platinum and he was extremely professional and kind through out the entire process. The website was easy to use, they were very willing to help us in any way and the wed site and song list were easy to use. Sound quality was great, music selection was great. Couldn’t have wanted anything more, and one of the more affordable options as well. Lots of options for upgrades if you’d like such as photo booths, better lighting and personalized touches but we didn’t opt for those, I’m sure they would have been fun though.

name: Alissa Maldonado
text: The guests would not stop dancing the entire night! The band was above and beyond. They did a great job between balancing spanish music and today's top hits. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Brandee Davis
text: Excellent experience!! The smoke machine and sparklers were a great accent to our big day!! Very professional and everything was organized so perfectly! I would definitely recommend using this company for your special occasions

name: A S
text:
Hello!

My client and I were not pleased with the cloud effects and the lighting. I kept having to keep dimming the lights to actually see the lights on the ceiling, which is not what I was expecting. They were not the lights that I requested.

I was never asked where I wanted the lights set up. Also, I was told that your employee could only run the cloud machine once and that is not what I paid for. I spoke with Andre the owner and he stated that he could not do it and I had a full camera crew on site for this event and it did not look well on cameras. I am really upset and feel like I was taken advantage of as a woman.

The owner eventually stated that he could do another cloud which did not last long at all.

I did not feel like a client that the company cared about. I felt taken advantage of and let down considering that this was a major event for my client.

I do feel like these issues need to be addressed.

resp.text:
Hello Aleta,

Unfortunately, the 3rd party person you booked us through did not explain the functions of the services you booked. They consulted us and told us that you needed dance floor lights and the dancing on the cloud. That is what your proposal was for and that is what was paid for and those are the services you received. If you needed the service multiple times then you would have to pay for the additional times.

There was never any contact from you until the day of the service. We spoke with the 3rd party you used to book the service, therefore, we cannot confirm what was agreed upon from those conversations between you and that person.

Dancing on the Cloud is a one time use cloud of smoke that is normally used for a first dance. It is not a multi-use service and it is what was requested and what was paid for. The dancing on the cloud lasts 2-3 minutes. That’s What we advertise on the website and that is what is written up on the client site by contract.

Dance Floor lights are moving head lights on truss stands that are Meant to shine on the dance floor. Also, with any lighting, it is not expected to have lights on in the room with lighting services. If you wanted Lighting for the entire room, WE would have advised you to go with uplights versus dance floor lights. We also would have advised 2 sets of uplights since the Boutwell Auditorium is a big venue. We never spoke with you, only your 3rd party booking person.

It was explained to you when you called the day of the event how the services work.

Many of our clients are women. We do not take advantage of people. We simply provide the services requested of us. Unfortunately, you didn’t give us a chance to discuss prior to posting a 1 star review.

Thanks! Have a Great Day!

name: Chelsea Ryles
text: Our DJ was AMAZING . He made our night PERFECT. The music transitions were ON POINT .  He kept the crowd up all night at our wedding . We also used him for uplighting , a photo booth and dancing on the clouds for our first dance which the guest enjoyed . We could not have asked for a better company to use for our wedding . He is worth EVERY PENNY.

name: Alyssa Angel
text: These guys are amazing! They provided the Photo Booth for my event and it was a HUGE hit! All of our guests loved it. It takes beautiful, high quality pictures and makes everyone look like a million bucks! The team also helped me design a custom layout for my prints and digital downloads which was amazing. These guys are the real deal and some of the best money we spent at the wedding! Don't hesitate to book them! You won't regret it, and i say that with confidence!

name: Harper Basquill
text: We hired Platinum Entertainment for my daughters 13th birthday party and had the DJ and mirror photo booth and they exceeded our expectations! They stayed in touch leading up to our event, did an excellent job designing graphics for the photo booth print out pictures, and kept the kids dancing with the music they chose! The mirror photo booth was very popular with the kids and adults, highly recommend the mirror photo booth!

name: Jessie Hickey
text: My husband and I got married on November 21, 2020 at Matthews Manor and DJ Platinum was our DJ! It was absolutely AMAZING! He checked in with us multiple times before the event, the night of was incredibly flexible, and overall made the night more enjoyable! He played the best music and listened to exactly what we wanted!

name: Breonna Dunn
text:
Trevon was AMAZING! Ceremony music and dj’ing during reception was flawless. However, one of my sparkles during our grand entry and re-entry did not work. Also, the fog machine and monogram did not have the effect I expected.

I would definitely hire Trevon though for future events.

name: Breanna Culwell
text: Absolutely incredible. I was super stressed about picking music right before the wedding they met with me, and as soon as we were done I was so confident in my music choices. He really knows how to read the crowd and get them involved and all out on the dance floor. Will definitely be hiring them for other events in the future, I could not have asked for a better DJ for our wedding. The photo booth was amazing. So many of my guests were taking about how great our DJ was not just at the reception but throughout the entire ceremony. If you are trying to find a DJ for your wedding, stop looking now, and hire platinum entertainment.

name: Tracie Hughey
text:
What an amazingly postiive experience I had!!!  I can not say enough about how professional Platinum Events was through this entire process.  We had a high school dance.  From the beginning to the end, the experience was wonderful.  First was the immediate responses to all questions and communication.  The website was professionally and clearly laid out.  The "ala carte" choosing of the services they provide was so user friendly.  All communication was done by email so everything was clear for me.  I didn't rely on any  verbal committments, it was all recorded in emails.  The price...frankly I don't know.  I live by the motto you get what you pay for....I love capitalism.  And if I paid more than other services, I don't care....I got what I paid for....a wonderful experience.  Our services included a DJ, lights, sound system, and mirror photo booth.
The DJ set up was compact, high quality and the DJ screened the music for me...(i had enough on my plate).  Their website allowed my daughter to upload a spotify playlist easily and he screened it.  It also allowed a timeline that he respected and utilized..  The website has event planning section ......It was great.  I wish I was gifted at writing so I could paint a picture of what a wonderful experience but.....I had a wonderful experience and will recommend and utilize them a hundred times over!!!  We also utilized the Mirror Photo Booth...so fun.  Great props, assistance at it's side the entire time, easily usable, I am so glad I upgraded to this but I am sure the starter photo selection is great too but I am glad I upgraded to this one.  They designed a stamp for each of the photos customized to our event and they initiated that process and went with it without much of my involvement because I didn't have time.  The individuals who worked the event were dressed appropriately for the event, cordial, available, cooperative....I appreciated them handling EVERYTHING.  It made it worth every penny.
My ONLY suggestion would be to work with them on customizing your props for the event.  That was a shortcoming on my part not theirs.  Their props were great but looking back, I wish I had included some things that were directed toward this group of seniors.
I can't thank them enough for working with us on providing these high school seniors a winter dance that had been cancelled by those around them twice who were more concerned about perceptions of participating in a "super spreader event".  They had a wonderful time, fantastic memories, and NO, we weren't a super spreader event.

name: Anne Heaney
text: Very professional! This team took such good care of my husband and I at our wedding and during the planning process, and made sure we had the perfect ceremony and reception! If you don’t want them to stray from playlist, I recommend telling them not to take requests, but just know you are in good hands with Platinum!

name: summer perry
text: Andre did such an amazing job providing the music for our wedding. He was very intuitive in playing songs that inspired our guests to dance and enjoy themselves! We also got the cold spark and dance floor light add ons and they were well worth it!! The cold sparks are SO AWESOME and surprised and delighted our guests during both our first dance and our wend off.

name: Bethany Henry
text: DJ Andre and his crew are truly the best in the business. The communication prior to the event, his professionalism during the event, and the overall execution was incredible and played a HUGE role in making our wedding day so fun and special. Andre did our ceremony and reception music and made everything flow so well with very little instruction from us...he didn’t miss a beat! His DJ booth, the uplighting, and his entire set-up look SO nice and professional! They add a very unique element that I wasn’t expecting, but was so happy with! DJ Andre played all the music that we requested, but also took guest requests and worked them in seamlessly to keep the overall vibe the same. And last but not least: they had a very sweet surprise for us and our guests at the end of the night that they had compiled throughout our day! I told everyone that night that Andre was not only one of our BEST vendors, but also one of the most affordable. You will not regret booking him for your wedding or special event!

name: Chloe Harbison
text:
We booked Platinum Entertainment to DJ at our wedding- we spoke with Andre and explained to him what we wanted at our ceremony and how we would like our reception to be a big, fun celebration. Andre did not disappoint- everything was phenomenal!! Our wedding would not have been the same without them, I could not recommend them enough!

Very professional and easy to work with!

name: Billy Parker
text: THE BEST DJ EVER!!!!! Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a DJ you can trust to do an incredible job. Our reception was the best!

name: JK Presnick
text: DJ Platinum was SO much fun!!! I don't think there was one wedding guest not dancing & I had an afternoon/day wedding! The entire company and process with Platinum Entertainment went above and beyond to make my wedding planning as least stressful as possible. The website allows you to customize your day however you wanted with a "do not play" list, a "play" list, a wedding day timeline & so much more!! I even ~joked~ the day before my wedding & told my parents that I thought the only wedding vendor that did not stress me out yet was the DJ! The morning of the wedding we got a call from DJ Platinum telling us that they got a new photo booth & were wondering if we wanted to try it out for FREE!!! I am SO HAPPY we were able to have this at the wedding!! For any future brides, I would HIGHLY recommend using their photo booth because it was an absolute HIT!! I was able to have a link of every picture that was taken in the booth & it was one of my favorite things to look back at from the day of!! Looking back at my day, I would ABSOLUTELY "splurge" with the photo booth! I couldn't imagine my day without it. Thank you so much Platinum Entertainment!! All of my guests complimented the DJ days later!!

name: Nicole Towns
text: I used Platinum Ent for uplighting and a photo booth. I was blown away with their service. The uplighting really made the room pop with the green color. The photo booth was so much fun. My guests really enjoyed it and I had a lot of fun playing on it. The personal touches that was designed was beautiful. There were so many options. I would definitely recommend them for any event!

name: Nia Richardson
text: DJ Andre was absolutely the best! The communication was great, and the online customer portal made it easy to customize my packages. He played all the music that I wanted and new songs that I loved. The uplighting was phenomenal and it really completed the look. Plus, the Mirror Booth was a hit all night long. Booking Platinum Ent was the best decision, and affordable too.

name: Brittany Mosier
text: DJ Platinum was SO AWESOME! He did our ceremony music and the reception for our wedding day and everything was perfect and exactly what we asked for. He responded quickly and efficiently to all my questions and had our wedding guests dancing the entire night! We loved our static monogram he created for us and it was exactly what we wanted! Our wedding guests still talk about how much fun he was and that the variety of music he played was fantastic! I could keep going on and on about him and how great the customer service was! Platinum Entertainment is a definite MUST for your wedding day DJ!

name: Ojas Gokhale
text:
I have known DJ Platinum as a coworker and as a DJ. He is the most amazing DJ we have encountered at Wedding events and there are not enough words to describe his talent; he takes requests on the fly and blends them seamlessly into his routine and often can incorporate music out of the standard genre (His Bollywood music skills are now legendary among my Indian friends). He performed at two of our friends weddings and obviously, recently at my own wedding. He set up the mood for the perfect party; one that my wife and I had desired. Everyone danced right right until the end. The lights and speakers he got were nothing short of a nightclub in Vegas.
He is very easy to work with and has a very professional approach, including an online dedicated user portal, with a form to setup songs. I highly, highly recommend his services.

name: Dana Franklin
text: Platinum Ent is the BEST to get all that you need to make your event sure to be a hit!  We used DJ Platinum Andre for our event lighting, mirror photo booth, dancing on the cloud, cold sparks, and more! Not only did the DJ really know how to turn up the party, and add beautiful special effects to our day, but the service was the ABSOLUTE BEST!!! Whenever we needed anything they were right there to help us!  I am big on service, so i the service is good I am highly likely to return and recommend your business! AND I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THERE SERVICES!!! Thanks again Platinum Entertainment!

name: Jessica Upton
text: Platinum Entertainment was excellent. They were easy to work with and everything was easy to set up. The music playlist can be set up through their website, which is super helpful. They also include must have songs and a "don't play" list. They took requests and made announcements throughout the ceremony as requested. Everyone at the wedding said it was the most fun wedding they'd been to - and a good bit of that experience can be attributed to the DJ  from Platinum Entertainment. They made our special day a lot more fun!

name: Sebastian Eady
text: DJ Platinum was awesome. He was very easy to contact and got back to us in a timely manner. His website is very straight forward where you could add a playlist to the website if needed. He played amazing music for all ages to enjoy!! He set up for the ceremony and reception and played the music according to the schedule. Overall great experience! Would recommend and use again to family and friends 100%. Thank you DJ Andre!!!

name: Justin Mathison
text: Andre and his team were phenomenal. Everything from the lighting to the custom logos to the EMCEEING to the mirror photo booth and of course the music was amazing! My wife and I could not be anymore pleased. He was super communicative throughout the entire process and we had so many great comments about the services he had to offer. He even did things on the fly which really helped us out! Thank you Andre and the Platinum ent. Team!

name: Kennedy Thomas
text: I do not have enough good things to say about Andre. He was so easy to work with, got back with you quickly, and made sure he knew exactly what you wanted for your big day! I trusted him completely with the song choices & he did an awesome job. He was good at reading the crowd, playing a mixture of genres & songs that got everyone dancing at my reception. Also- his prices are INCREDIBLE! Really cannot go wrong with DJ Platinum!

name: Tricia Tapley
text: Andre with PlatinumEntertainment was awesome!!! Best DJ, lighting. Professional setup!! He kept all the guests dancing all night long. Such an easy person to work with. Highly recommended him for any of their services. His online setup of your timeline, music playlist and do not play, etc was so easy to do. He is so much fun and fantastic to work with!!! Thanks for a wonderful wedding party for our daughter.!!

name: sarah stephens
text: Platinum Entertaining DJ went above and beyond at our wedding reception!!! He kept the party going for 5 hours!! The dance floor was full for a solid 4 hours. During the planning process Andre addressed all of my questions within the same day. He was so easy to work with and made me feel confident that we’d have a fun wedding. He played all of our songs as requested and ended the songs where I wanted them to end (we did partial songs during the father/daughter mother/son dance). He did cues for different parts of the reception (toasts, send off, etc). Everyone commented that they had the best time and it was largely because of the music choices! I’m so beyond thankful for Platinum Entertaining, they did a fantastic job!!

name: Stacey Green
text: I rented the photo mirror for our employee banquet.  It was a huge hit.  Everyone loved the pictures.  We really enjoyed using the props and the guy who managed it was great.

name: Keisha B.
text:
One word: AMAZING!!! My wedding reception was on Saturday, October 7, 2017 in Huntsville, AL. I think on Tuesday evening, I decided I wanted a photo booth and so the search began. During my search, I ran across Platinum Ent Dj's website. They offer a Mirror Booth rental. BEST THING EVER!!! What I loved about the website was that you could instantly find out if the booth was available for your event and how much it would cost. I also was very happy that this company was willing to travel to Huntsville, approximately 1.5hrs away from Birmingham, for my event.

From the very beginning, Andre was courteous and professional.  This company definitely understands customer service and it shows! They provided an easy and convenient method to pay for the services online which I appreciated. They also showed up early to the event just to make sure everything was in its proper place.

The mirror booth was a real hit with my guests. Everyone absolutely loved it! Based on my experience, I highly recommend this company to anyone looking for quality service and a stress-free event. This company literally exceeded all my expectations.

name: Amy Davidson
text: DJ Andre was a fantastic DJ for our daughter’s wedding reception! He kept the party going for 4 hours and was so easy to work with. We would definitely recommend him for any event.

name: Mary Cowan
text: DJ Platinum and his crew were amazing! Very professional and read the crowd very well! Everyone can’t stop talking about how much fun the wedding was! The up lighting is a MUST! 10/10!

name: Sheriah Gibson
text: Awesome to work with! As an event planner, Andre made my job easy but his timeliness and making sure I was fully aware of their needs to execute the event and keep our clients pleased. He was great to work with and I look forward to booking him again soon! Thank you!

name: Ivy Patterson
text: “We had a great experience with DJ Platinum. We were ambivalent about getting a good DJ because we wanted to avoid the corny vibe we’ve seen so much at school dances, but Andre was down to the earth, played great music, was totally accommodating to our students, and created an incredible soundtrack for our night! He was also perfect with timing and setting everything up before the dance started.  Plus, he adjusted his songs to the vibe of the party which was awesome. It was great to have DJ Platinum along with his lovely wife Kia.  It was just great to have someone so attuned to what we wanted. This DJ company is super professional and reliable and communication was wonderful and clear throughout. Thank you again Andre and Kia for sound-tracking such a wonderful night!”

name: Ashley Harris
text: Andre was super responsive as we were planning for our wedding on June 9th. He even put together a last minute mix for the father Daughter dance! Price was absolutely reasonable and the Photo Mirror is a must!! Would definitely recommend!

name: Brittney Jones
text: Amazing and professional company, they are the best and made both of events successful! I can't wait to use them again.

name: Miranda Carroll
text: I absolutely loved the photo booth at a recent Wedding I attended. It Captures all of your personal&funniest experiences, and memories😍🥂🍾💕 I highly recommend this for your next Event⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Britnee Wellman
text: DJ Platinum was wonderful! He is a lot of fun, but still very professional. Our guests really enjoyed the variety of music he played and had a great time. The lighting looked great and he created our monogram for the dance floor. Two thumbs up!

name: Dedric & Tonja Brown
text: Dj Platinum did our wedding and he was the best...the lighting was every thing, the monogram was so beautiful, and the music was non stop and perfect. He is very professional and i would definitely recommend his services and use him again for another event!!!! Thanks for making our day rememberable!!!!!

text: Dj platinum was EXCELLENT, He kept the crowd dancing. The lighting was beautiful. I can't wait to book him for our next event. He made sure our wedding and reception was perfect.

name: Courtney Harris

name: Courtney Harris
text: Words can’t express how great and excellent the service was. From the lightning, to the photo booth, dancing on the cloud and to the cold sparkler machines everything was outstanding! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: LaToya Smith
text: I worked with  DJ Platinum on my husband's birthday party. I highly recommend his services.  He was both professional and affordable.  DJ Platinum is equipped to handle any size event.

name: Jessica Spence
text: DJ Platinum did an amazing job at our wedding reception this past weekend. We received so many compliments about him from our family and friends. He definitely kept the party going! We would definitely recommend him to any future bride and grooms.

name: Sheriah Gibson
text:
Great services! Andre and his team consistently provide our clients with the best products and quality around.

Thank you! - Posh Occasions by Sheriah, LLC.

name: Crystal Duco
text: The photo mirror was a huge hit at our wedding!  They were so nice and easy to work with!  One of the best decisions!

name: Sametra Moore
text:
I would like to thank DJ Andre for providing an excellent service for my husband 50th surprise birthday party.  He kept my guest dancing the entire time. I highly recommend this DJ.

Thank you for your service.

Mrs. Moore

name: Shenita Counts
text: I normally don’t write reviews but in this case I made an exception. In the words of my daughter, The DJ was “Lit”!! They were very professional and on time. The teenagers and I loved the music selections, the photo booth and all the up lighting. A+ service!

name: Gabriele Watts
text: Can’t rave about this company enough!!! They kept us on the dance floor all night. The lighting was spectacular and the videography was stunning when we saw the final product! Book them!!! You will not regret it!

name: Devon Reid
text: DJ platinum provided a variety of music for our wedding. It turned from a wedding, to a blast of a party! Lol

name: Megan Harris
text: DJ Platinum went above and beyond for my wedding! I loved everything. I definitely will be using him again.

name: Tederick Withers
text: We really enjoyed everything and the staff was very nice and professional we appreciate everything and we'll be contacting again for our next event

name: Memendra Page
text: Awesome service... He was superb..he is a one stop shop.. This is the company you want to book to make everything a sucees

name: Rodrigus Cannon

Curtia Moon
MXK Events & Weddings

name: Nachica Thomas
text: Best DJ around and the lighting system is AWESOME!!!

name: Tory Moody
text: Dj Platinum was there for us from the beginning to the big day on our wedding day! The area we were having our wedding at was pretty much a cell phone dead zone, but Dj Platinum thought that out and gave us a form list to send him with sections to write in what songs we wanted; once that got back to him he created the playlist and took care of the rest. He made everything simple and more important for me and my bride he made it affordable; definitely, definitely, would recommend him to anyone I know who has a wedding coming up or even a party and a needs a Dj who is professional and is kind on their wedding budget! For the package we asked for Do Platinum definitely exceeded our expectations; of course besides providing great music he provided lights to help provide the right atmosphere to our reception, and his travel fee was definitely kind on our wallet. When the wedding was over and we went to the reception hall and walk through the doors DJ platinum had a very great set up waiting for us; what stood out most to us was the fact that the lights he used lit up the walls and ceiling with me and my wife's favorite colors of red and purple, both us and the guess we're blown away! A great time was definitely had by all, and none of that would have been possible without the professional help of Do Platinum!

name: Christopher Thornton Sr
text: Andre and Kia were very responsive to our last second requests and odd requirements of our over 40 group Christmas Party (60 guests).

name: Lashonda Calloway
text: Awesome, professional, everything for my wedding was beautiful!!

name: Daren Turner
text: Awesome service and music!

name: Kristin Smith
text: This place was sooooo awesome! The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. I highly recommend doing this while visiting Orange Beach Alabama!!

name: Jayden Marsh
text: Definitely recommend to anyone traveling or in the area. My girlfriend and I loved it and got a ton of fun, goofy, cute pictures! Thanks to Tracy we got to look around before and check out all 50 backgrounds and even got help with different poses and pictures! The Cool Shots Selfie Museum was definitely a fun part of our trip.

name: Brianna Stout
text: I absolutely loved this place!!!! I can’t wait to go back with more friends!!!! There are so many cool backgrounds and props!!! Megan was super friendly and helpful! I had the best time!!!! Don’t be afraid to go alone too cause they have selfie stands!!! They also have awesome lighting!!! Absolutely fantastic and fun!!!!

name: Chyna Chrisman
text: this place was so much fun! as soon as my boyfriend and i walked in we were immediately greeted by tracy i believe was her name! she was super helpful and kind! we will never forget this place! we also got some great shots that will last a lifetime :)

name: Mandie McArty Gosa
text: Wow! A bit pricey, but what a gem when you need a break from the sun! Generally, I would have not thought twice about a "Selphie Museum", however, coming across a few reviews during my search for things to do in Gulf Shores, we decided to give it a shot...and we were NOT disappointed! We could have stayed for HOURS if we allowed ourselves. We had 3 adults with two 12 yr old boys, one 10 yr old boy, and an 8 yr old girl. We ALL had a blast!!

name: Mallorie Brunswig
text: My boyfriend and I went and we had an amazing time!!! There are so many different places to take pictures and cool background. Good for all ages. I definitely would go back if I lived closer. Megan (the manager) was happy to help with anything we needed and gave us great tips. I definitely recommend!

name: Jasmine Morley
text: This place is so much fun! Worth the price and definitely would go back!

name: Morgan Daniels
text: My family had so much fun!!! Even if you don’t want to be in the photos you can take them of your kids , spouse , friends for free!! Price isn’t bad if you want to be in the photos ... they even did a bonus family picture at the end of your tour . All the props were great !!!! The lighting was Amazing! Be on the lookout for the cutest dog in the world, he enjoyed being a prop in our photos as well ! All around my whole family loved it .

name: Amber Morris
text: Awesome little adventure with the kids. We saw it while riding through The Wharf, and it turned out to be really fun! I highly recommend as something to engage all ages and I'd definitely do it again.

name: Jodi Kershner
text: We had so much fun at this place. Stopped here while on vacation in Gulf Shores. They had so many unique sets to take pictures in. Owner was very friendly and we even got pictures with his dog. The girl at the front was helpful and great with the kids. This was definitely money well spent!

name: Melanie Berman
text: This place was so much fun! It’s great to go in the morning when no one is there. Meagan was very helpful and we had a great time.

name: Sarah Redding
text: Had a blast here!! So many cool rooms and photo ops. There’s even a dog that came and took some selfies with me. Regret not asking her name, but the blonde girl working the desk was incredibly friendly and helpful, and went out of her way to show us around and give us good tips. An experience I will never forget!

name: Lily D
text:
This was such a fun experience! The owner and the workers were so sweet and helpful. We had so much fun, and each set was really well done! Our photos turned out great!!!
I would say though my only complaint was that, while each set had a ringlight, they didn’t all have a way to hold the phone up for you. Not a big deal tho!

name: Bryan King
text: I had no idea this place would be as cool as it was when I first paid for it! I thought it would be pretty lame and I thought I was doing it just for my young preteen daughter. But… It was a blast. I got some great photos that we will have the rest of our life. Jennifer was amazing! I would put this on the list of things you MUST do in Orange Beach!

name: Stormy Hubbard
text: My husband and I were celebrating our anniversary in town and saw this place. We popped in to see what it was about and spent nearly 2 1/2 hours taking pictures of each other. We laughed so much and got some great shots of each other. So much fun !!!

name: Allison Bishop
text: My visit was awesome. Went as a group made it very fun. Jennifer handled every question we had with patience and a wonderful smile. Absolutely recommend this fit fun time and great memories

text: Went to Cool Shots for the first time today for my Tiktok obsessed daughter just had to go. Not only were each set unique they were well put together. Upon checking in we were given a warm welcoming from the owners sweet pups, a light stick to use while there and a demo. Each set had its own ring light. The owner came out and spoke to us a few times and the staff was beyond sweet. Well worth the money and could see coming back to enjoy at a later date. My daughter is already asking when she can bring her friends.

resp.text: Sorry, we didn't get to finish our conversation.  I Like to talking to other business owners and learning a couple of things.  GREAT photo with Theo - he loves kids!!!!
