name: Karen Costa
text: Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores is the best jewelry store, very friendly and fast service. Appreciate the employees that work there.

resp.text: Thank you Karen, we appreciate your kind words. Thank you for the positive review 😇

name: John Mitchell
text: Awesome experience and very welcoming atmosphere. I bought Pandora, they have a very good selection. Staff was extremely polished and polite. Will definitely shop her for all my jewelry needs.

name: Larcy Sorensen
text: Purchased an item online on a Monday and received on Wednesday. Fast shipping! And exactly what I ordered.

name: Angel Ballard
text: Amazing staff , exceptional jewelry and GREAT customer service.  I have used them for years and will continue!

resp.text: Thank you Angel! We appreciate your continued support 💗

name: Tanya jimenez
text: Very good service. Brought my 3 watches to get the battery replaced and they told me about the Google Check in offer, voluntarily. The watch battery replacement took only a couple of hours since their were others in front of me. Definitely found my watch shop. Will come again.

resp.text: Thank you Tanya! We appreciate your business and for choosing us💗

name: Kathy Acton
text: Love Diamond Jewelers is absolutely wonderful!  I love dealing with Stephanie, she is the nicest, most knowledgeable and professional person ever!

name: Leigh Nichols
text: The staff was awesome. We will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Leigh ❤️

name: Michael Morton
text: Excellent service. Very friendly staff and very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you Michael! We appreciate your business

name: Tiffany Knight
text: Great Customer Service!!!  Mrs. Mae was Amazing!! She was very Helpful Kind and Patient! My visit at Diamond Jewelers was Awesome!! I would definitely recommend!!! Thanks Again!!😘

name: Tim Marshall
text:
This jeweler is awesome!
Lorrie is an outstanding sales lady. She listens well and always makes the customer feel like they are the only one in the store. Everyone is very polite and respectful of your time and money you spend.
We will definitely go back there for future purchases.
Sincerely
Tim & Robin

resp.text: Thank you Tim for the kind words, we appreciate you coming to see us. 😊

name: Taylor Daily
text: Great people, great service!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor! We appreciate you

name: Colby R.
text: Very friendly place. Good assortment of inventory. The only jewelry place in South Baldwin County I know of that sells Pandora.

name: Eric Tillotson
text: Found this store on google and stopped by while on vacation to shop for engagement rings. The staff were all incredibly friendly. My fiancé chose a stone and separate setting. They set the stone and had the ring ready same day for us because we were planning to leave town that afternoon. Lorrie was amazing and worked with us to get the sale done despite their computers having issues that day. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was such a pleasure to meet you guys. I hope to see you again soon. -Lorrie

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: I was recently shopping for a very special piece of jewelry. The folks at Diamond Jewelers were so helpful and fun! Selection was great and after shopping around various jewelry stores, I went back to Diamond Jewelers. I wasn't sure exactly what I was looking for when I began my search but, ended up falling in love with the first piece I tried on and had to go back for it. The entire experience was FUN and incredibly memorable!! I highly recommend Diamond Jewelers!!

resp.text: Thank you, Dana!  I was so happy to meet you and it was such a pleasure helping you pick out your perfect ring!  I can’t wait to visit with you and Allen again in the future!  We’ve got to find that perfect wedding band for you!  Thanks again!  — Lorrie

name: Anita Housand
text: Wonderful staff, great customer service, always treat you like a very good friend!

name: kimberly mccauley
text: Love this jewelry store!  Nice selection, reasonable prices, and super friendly and helpful staff. It’s a must visit when in this area.

resp.text: Thanks so much Kimberly! We appreciate you coming to visit💗

name: Lee Hicks
text:
SUPER SERVICE!!! Everyone goes over board to make sure you are pleased with their work.
I would recommend using them for any of your jewelry needs.
Cannot tell you how happy I am with their work!!!

resp.text:
Lee, Thanks so much for the super review! We appreciate you choosing us!
Blessings,
From all of us at Dj’s

name: Crystal Buzard
text: We love the girls at Diamond Jewelers. They are the sweetest ever. My husband buys me jewelry every year for our Anniversary there the jewelry is always beautiful and very high quality!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you so much! Thanks for being a part of the Diamond Jewelers family.

name: Sharon Hawthorne
text: Our family loved to shop at Diamond jewelers! They are always friendly courteous and knowledgeable.  Such Gorgeous and Unique pieces of Jewelry!  I recommend Diamond Jewelers to all of my friends. Thank u Daphne, Lorrie, Dawn and Stephanie ! Y’all are exceptional!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Sheri! We love what we do and blessed to have friends like you to come visit and shop 💝

name: allym205
text: The staff members at this store are amazing. Stephanie helped me with information about ring sizing and was super sweet. She seemed genuinely interested in my engagement! Unfortunately, due to my warranty plan on my ring, I was unable to have my ring sized through Diamond Jewelers but I will be back for bands! Thanks again Stephanie!

resp.text: Thank you for the super kind words! I’m very excited for you. Enjoyed talking to you and appreciate you stopping by to see us.

name: Jennifer Spruiell
text: Stellar service and fast with two repairs for me. Always so welcoming and attentive. Feels like family. I like to go to a place where they call you by name and treat you like you are the most important matter of the day. Amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet comment Jennifer, we always enjoy your company ❤️

name: Tanner Howard
text: Diamond Jewelers is my favorite jewelry store, not only due to their great selection, but more importantly, their service. I'm always treated kindly, and the staff goes out of it's way to make their customers happy. The owners are extremely generous, and we are fortunate to have this family-owned business in our community.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Tanner. We appreciate the positive feedback 💗

name: Kelli Perkins
text:
At First when I walked in I thought, oh my I just possibly could be in the wrong place as far as my budget goes. Then was  immediately greeted by a warm smiling face! I  quickly realized I was going to be able to shop here. Laurie was outstanding, she knew all  The answers to my questions and those that she did not she quickly found the answer!
After purchasing something, I decided to get them to repair my jewelry that I was looking for a jeweler to do.  I just found  where I will be doing my jewelry shopping and recommending family and friends !!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. It was so nice to meet you Kelli, looking  forward to seeing you soon. Have a Merry Christmas

name: Denise B. Owens
text: Always a pleasure to shop at Diamond Jewelers. Dawn McKenzie is truly a blessing. She knows the perfect thing to show you out of a choice of millions. Great customer service in the store or by telephone.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Jeanette Breault
text: They shipped out the order and arrived two days earlier than promised with a hand written Thank You! on the receipt. Very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanette, glad your order came earlier than expected. And many thanks for the kind review 💗😊

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: What an amazing experience! I was so sad to drop my engagement ring off. It is a family piece and I didn't want to part with it long. I dropped it off on Monday morning and had it back on my finger 2 days later. They not only cleaned and buffed it, but they replaced prongs, took it down nearly 2 sizes and gave me a measurement on the carat weight of the center diamond. The fit is perfect and I could not be happier! Thank you so so much Diamond Jewelers!

resp.text: So happy you are pleased Katelin. We appreciate you💝

name: Maves Youngblood
text: The place was packed! Standing room only! And, yet, I was immediately greeted, directed to the right person and assisted. Professional, speedy and fairly priced. What else can you ask for? Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Maves! I’m glad we could serve you in a timely manner. We appreciate you being patient? It does get a little busy 💝

name: Guelph Ontario
text: Have always had a great experience with Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores. Today was not. I will not return to Diamond Jewelers ever again. I did not enjoy the rude and condescending attitude Daphne exhibited towards me. I’ve never been treated that way in the past. But I’ll tell you it was enough to put me off from ever spending any of my hard earned money there again. Do yourself a favor and drive to Manning Jewelry in Foley. The staff there was beyond friendly. I’ll be doing business with Manning from here on out. Diamond Jewelers might need a little refresher on customer service.

resp.text:
I'm saddened to read this, in no way whatsoever did I realize that I was being condescending. This is my family's store and I'm so grateful to everyone that comes through the door. I truly did not mean to come across in a negative way that was not my intention. I want to offer you a $50 gift card from me.

My deepest apologies

name: Patty King
text: Such sweet people. I think it was “Lorrie” who helped me the last 2 visits. She is so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.  She greets me with a welcoming smile as soon as I walk in the door.  One of the tiny stones had fallen out of my sterling silver ring that I’ve had for months, and Lorrie made sure to get it fixed in just 2 days (so I would have it for my trip out of town). Just wonderful!  I will always be a Diamond World customer. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Patty! I appreciate the sweet compliment. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: Jennifer Clough
text: Absolutely love Diamond Jewelers.  Had my engagement ring sized and it fits perfectly.  They also shined and puffed it and it looks amazing. Definitely will be using them in the future for all my jewelry needs. Stephanie is very sweet and super professional.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer!! It was so nice meeting you & that precious Lennox!! We appreciate you coming in!! Enjoy your pretty ring! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Jackie Wireman
text: I had to return a product that I purchased a few months ago they were so pleasant with no questions gladly gave me a new product and it was a great great visit I would go there anytime for anything they stand behind all their products what more can you ask for I would recommend their beautiful shop to everybody Jackie Wireman

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Jackie!! We always love our visits with you! :)

name: Debbie Walters
text: Wonderful experience. My Apple Watch band got stuck on the watch. Took it in and the Jeweler was able to fix it right away. While I was waiting I inquired about a tennis necklace pendant. The ladies were so helpful. They found the tennis racket pendant and also helped me pick out a one really nice chain. Will definitely keep going back. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Debbie! Thank you for the kind words

name: Megann Steege
text: I will definitely be returning to Diamond Jewelers! Top of the line selections, and the staff was amazing. Jeff Goodman went above and beyond to make my experience one to remember.

resp.text: Thank you Megann, you’re  the best and we appreciate all that you do for our city

name: Debbie Phares
text: Found the perfect item. Diamond Jewelers had a good selection. Lorrie was very friendly and helpful. The jeweler will have our item ready in a day or earlier.  To get personal attention, fair prices, and great service visit Diamond Jewelers first.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie! We are thankful you chose us. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: D Kirkdoffer
text: Stephanie is one of the nicest sales persons! Her sweet spirit is contagious!  And she is very knowledgeable of fine jewelry. Thanks to her we will visit again.

resp.text: You are the sweetest! Thank you for the kind words. I love where I work and you make my job extra special. Sorry for getting this message so late 💝

name: Missy Tyler
text: I stopped in to have links removed from a Tag watch. Although I spent very little, the staff treated me like a dear friend. That is typical of this lovely shop. We love Diamond Jewelers, especially Lorrie!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Missy! We love our sweet customers & appreciate you coming in!! Take Care! Lorrie

name: Blake Rowell
text: Fantastic service at every turn. You can’t go wrong here.

resp.text: Thank you Missy, we really appreciate the kind  words 💗

name: Maureen Crawford
text:
Very friendly and helpful people! We were visiting from Illinois. Our small town no longer has a full service local jeweler, and we needed a ring cut off, a replacement earring back, and some pieces cleaned. Ours was not a high ticket purchase, but we were treated as if it were.
They have some beautiful pieces, and a beautiful store!

resp.text: Maureen, that is so sweet! Thanks for taking the time to message the generous comment, please come see us again 💕

name: Cyndie Pankonien
text: I found this store from an ad they had in a travelers station when we were passing through. I contacted them about Pandora charms they had for their area & ordered some for my mom and myself. She has since passed away and this was the last trip we took together.  I noticed my dangle on my charm was missing. I called as soon as I noticed it. They were so kind to send me a replacement charm at a discounted price. I highly recommend this business!! Thank you Diamond Jewelers for helping me to keep my memory keepsake!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet personal message, hoping you have the best New Year ahead and may you be blessed with much joy!

name: Shane Smith
text: Always, very friendly and helpful.

name: Debra Tarr
text: Always the best service and quality!  Picked out a beautiful necklace for my nieces high school graduation. Amazing staff and amazing service. I will be a regular forever :-).

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Debra!! It's always good to see you! I know your niece will love her necklace! We appreciate you & love some Rita's!!! :)

name: Yessicaa CohRin
text: They are always welcoming with a smile! Love the pandora section my girlfriend gets me rings for every holiday from there! I had a stone fall out and they replaced it within a day! Very good prices and well worth the money!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind comment. We appreciate you choosing us!

name: Annette Ross
text: Wonderful shop! As always, Lorie was a "jewel "!  Have made several purchases and plan to make more in the future! A hometown atmosphere that is hard to beat! A great staff! Thanks for always making me feel welcome!

resp.text: Thank you Annette! We appreciate the kind words!

name: judy blair
text: I I purchased a very nice Pandora charm at Diamond Jewelers in Gulf l Shoes, Alabama today. The girl who waited on me was very familiar with their Pandora merchandise. The store had  Pandora charms for both Gulf Shoes and Orange Beach. Their prices were very reasonable. I will see them next year for another charm.  I think you should check them out!

resp.text:
Mrs. Judy,
Thank you so much for your kind words! I enjoyed helping you with your Pandora charm! I hope you enjoy it, and we look forward to seeing you next year! Don't hesitate to call if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Mary Kathryn

name: Courtney Steffek
text: Fantastic service, warm, caring and professional staff! Great place to trust with your valuables.  LOVE LOVE LOVE these people!

name: Barbara Killam
text: I love Diamond Jewelry!!!!  Lorrie and the sales staff are so sweet and helpful!  I try to purchase all my Pandora bracelets and charms from them!  They have the best selection!

resp.text: We love you Barbara and always look forward to seeing g you and catching up. 💜

name: Nancy Shawhan
text: Super friendly staff, always willing to go the extra mile to take care of customers!  Love, love, LOVE Diamond Jewelry (the store, not actual diamond jewelry... well, wait... love that too. So, I actually love both Diamond Jewelry and jewelry with diamonds.). :)

name: Tina Dalton
text: I am new to Diamond Jewelers and have found my jewelers.  My engagement ring and wedding set are gorgeous.  The staff is fabulous and such a pleasure. We will go nowhere else.

resp.text: Your the best Tina! We had so much fun with you today! Hope you guys have the best New Year!

name: Dale Mikkelsen
text: Love Diamond Jewelers. Love everything I have purchased. The owners and employees are awesome! My favorite jewelry store! 😊

resp.text: Thank you Dale! Lots of love sweet friend 💝

name: Sarah Forbis
text: A big thank you to Dawn and the jeweler for their quick and thorough attention to my wedding band (accidentally stepped on and bent). They were able to fix, replace the diamond lost and polish up in less than 24 hours at a very competitive and fair price.  Thanks so much for your help!

name: Kim Edgerton
text: Beautiful store and excellent service always!   The staff is always very friendly, helpful and patient while I browse around looking for just the right items!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us Kim, We hope you have a  great Thanksgiving with your family 💕

name: Bill S
text: Awesome service! Very reasonable prices!

resp.text: Thank you Bill! Hope to see you again soon 😊

name: Connie King
text: We have used Diamond Jewelers for a couple years! Very professional staff and helpful. Stephanie has always gone above and beyond to meet our needs. I highly recommend them for whatever your jewelry needs are!

resp.text: You are so sweet Mrs. Connie! I enjoyed helping you and Tony! Hope to see y'all again! Thanks so much! Stephanie

name: Stacey Wilson
text: Most genuine, sweetest folks! They have a huge selection of gorgeous jewelry at all different price ranges. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: You are so sweet Stacey!! Thanks for the kind words!

name: Lafondraetta Lanier
text: Lorrie was knowledgeable and very helpful. I’ve had my Pandora bracelet for years and haven’t purchased new charms so I was really happy for her experience. There were lots of choices for me to choose from and there was a sale going on. I highly recommend this store.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lafondretta!  It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope you will come back and visit us when you're in town!    Kindest Regards, Lorrie

name: Sue Carol
text: The associate was awesome! She recommended some beautiful jewelry, one that I did purchase. Also had links removed from a new watch which they did right away! Highly recommend this jewelry store!!

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Sue!! I hope you're enjoying your jewelry! :)

name: Sandy Dobrzynski
text: I was looking for Pandora charms and earring hoops.  They had both and a very helpful sales  lady helped me out.  When I got back to Wisconsin I immediately put them together and absolutely love my Orange Beach bracelet. ( May have to get matching charms for my earrings too)

resp.text: Thank you Sandy! Congrats on your Pandora purchase and please let us know if we can help you in any way. Check out our website...you can order online and we will be happy to ship you anything.

name: Janice Murphy
text: My very first Pandora purchase couldn’t have been better! Lorrie was wonderful and endured my endless, newbie questions with warm, friendly professionalism. Our stop at Diamond Jewelers was fun and informative. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Janice, I thoroughly enjoyed your visit, and was so happy to meet your friends, as well!  Please come back to see us when you're in Gulf Shores....and don't forget to call me with your Wish List!

name: Lenora Neal
text: I purchase a Pandora Charm each time we take a vacation.  Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores has  great selection of Pandora Charms!  Their staff is very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind word Lenora 🦋

name: Kimberly Ray
text: Always a wonderful experience at Diamond Jewelers! Everyone on staff - Daphne, Dawn, Lori, Mary Kathryn & Stephanie are so welcoming and easy to work with. It only took 10 minutes from the time I went in until I had picked out what I wanted, had it rang up, paid for and wrapped beautifully. Thank you ladies for all of your hard work!

name: Kyle Sparks
text: I just went in to the store to see if they sold engagement ring boxes. The one I have is very noticeable when in my pocket. They only sold ones with their name on it. They were very professional in telling me so. As I walked back to the parking lot the lady flagged my back down and brought me 2 very nice boxes that she was able to find and wished me good luck. Free of charge. That saved me a lot of troubles. Thank you

resp.text:
Kyle,
Thank you so much for taking your time to write this sweet experience.  We are so glad we could help you with something that seemed so simple.  If you ever need anything at all, don't hesitate to call.  Congratulations!
Dawn

name: April DePaola
text: The ONLY jeweler to use!!!  I stopped in today expecting to have to leave my jewelry for repair but they took care of it on the spot. Great selection of jewelry and the employees are the most helpful without being pushy for a sale. It’s worth your while to stop in and look periodically just to see the new items they’ve received in the estate area too. :-).

resp.text:
You are so sweet April! I enjoyed seeing you and that precious baby boy! It's always a pleasure helping you! Thanks for your kind words! :)
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Jessica OBanner
text:
I've been coming to Gulf Shores for years.  This past trip was memorable like all the rest. However, I wanted to add some Pandora Charms to my bracelet to commemorate this visit. I googled to see if there were any jewelry stores in the area that carried the brand. Diamond Jewelers have an entire section of Pandora Merchandise. I was warmly greeted as soon as I entered the store. **There wasn't that awkward silence like someone is estimating how much you're going to spend.**  The saleswoman was informative, patient, and attentive. Great customer service will always leave a lasting impression. I'll definitely be returning.
J. from Jackson, MS

name: Kew Taybi
text: This was my first purchase at this jewelry store. They came highly recommended by a friend and I was not disappointed. The sales lady who met me was most helpful and give me several options at very reasonable prices.

name: Linda Richmond
text: I just made my first purchase from Diamond Jewelers this past week. They were very professional, friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of jewelry and all at great prices. I will definitely be returning to make future purchases.

name: Tom Martin
text: Having recently moved to Gulf Shore, this was our first visit to Diamond Jewelers.  We could not have been more impressed with the extensive knowledge and friendliness of the entire sales staff.  Stephanie was exceptional patiently guiding us through their large estate jewelry inventory.   Diamond Jewelers is now our “go to” jewelry store for all our fine jewelry purchases.

resp.text:
Tom,
Thank you so much for your sweet review.  We are so happy to have you in our area and are glad you feel at home with the store! I'm always here to help if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Barbette Driver
text: I stopped in Diamond Jewelers to get a battery replaced in a waterproof watch and the staff welcomed me as if I did business in there often and was a regular customer.  The jeweler also fixed a necklace.  The charge was very reasonable .  I highly recommended them for your jewelry needs.

name: Wendy Ingram
text: Jewelry repair top notch! Exceptional customer service with Lorrie as well. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Wendy! Hope you have a great rest of your summer 🌴🌞🍉

name: Pam Harris
text: Delightful Experience! The staff was very professional, knowledgeable, and personable. I loved working with Dawn  -- She provided personized service...going the extra mile to ensure that I was completely satisfied with my purchase.  What I valued most was her genuine excitement and happiness for me - she made it fun!!!!!  Looking forward to my next shopping experience at Diamond Jewelers!

name: Phyllis Britt
text: I initially went to Diamond Jewelers two years ago to buy the Gulf Shores Pandora charm for our daughters, daughter in laws and granddaughter.  Since then I have bought many Pandora charms for birthdays and Christmas.  Last Fall I broke a favorite paisley necklace, took it by to see if they could repair.  They did !!  Yesterday they helped me get new battery for my husband's watch.  I cannot say enough how nice everyone is. So glad I found them and would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: thank you Phyllis for the sweet generous feedback. Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Jan Marsh
text: I asked that DJ  find a specific stone for a ring and a setting to accommodate a specific carat weight of diamonds around the stone — all within a budget amount. They quickly got in two stones and two settings to meet these requirements for me to see. I selected the stone and setting and the finished ring (which they shipped to me) far exceeded my expectations. I love my sales person -Dawn. She worked tirelessly with many calls, texts pictures etc to make this happen.

name: Phil Payne
text:
It is always a great experience shopping at Diamond Jewelers. Jeff the owner always greets everyone with a smile as well as all the wonderful ladies that work there
Great selection of all kinds of diamonds and ladies jewelry
Always a pleasure to shop there

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Phil! Thank you and Lisa for choosing us, we are blessed to have you as faithful customers ❤️

name: dennis holland
text: great experiance

resp.text: Thank you Dennis!

name: Mark Scarborough
text: The entire staff at Diamond Jewelers are always friendly and very helpful when I visit. Best jewelers in the area!

resp.text: Thank you Mark! We appreciate the positive feedback

name: Clara Hendrix
text: Everyone is so nice and helpful at the store. Stephanie has always helped me find the perfect gift. She has always made me feel special.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Clara! It's always so good to see you! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Gerald Sanders
text:
Wonderful people. Excellent customer service. Always  a pleasure to do business with  Diamond Jewelers.

.

name: Penny Groux
text: Shopping at Diamond Jewelers is always a wonderful experience.  The care and personal attention given to customers is unparalleled and their knowledge and advice is always sincerely appreciated.  I’m so thankful I found such a great jeweler here on the beautiful Alabama Gulf Coast!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Penny! Thank you for the sweet message. Hope you guys have a blessed Christmas 🎄

name: Robert Lancaster
text: Very friendly,  helpful,  knowledgeable and accommodating.  Oh, and reasonable prices. What more could you ask for? My new hometown jeweler!

name: Steve Peralta
text:
Great place to shop for jewelry.
Lorrie Kruk helped me again find the right gift for my wife. She is always so sweet and helpful. Everyone there is also very nice.
I like shopping local so I keep them on my list of places I go for quality merchandise and impeccable service.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Steve, for your kind words!  It's always a pleasure seeing your smiling face!  I hope your wife loves her gift.  I look forward to your next visit!  ...... Lorrie

name: Phyllis Britt
text: This is my favorite jewelry store.  They are my go to store for Pandora charms for gifts and they have really cool Gulf Shores and Orange Beach Pandora charms.   Also saw new Orange Beach and Gulf Shores bracelets that use the letters to close bracelet.  It’s in my birthday and Santa lists. ❤️

name: Stephanie Gatlin
text: Diamond Jewelers is truly the best jewelry store in the heart of Gulf Shores.  I have been apart of the Diamond Jewelers family for 5 years, and I couldn't think of a better place to spend my days.  When customers walk through the door, we want them to feel right at home.  Diamond Jewelers is not only a business, but also a happy place where customers leave as friends.  We strive to go above and beyond for every jewelry need. We genuinely appreciate every person that comes in, and strive to give them a wonderful experience.

name: Janet Ayers
text:
Called in advance to make sure they had what we were looking for and walked in and they had just what we asked for. Gulf Shores inspired beads for my Pandora Braclet. They had so many great beads but they had several with Gulf Shores initialed on them. We made our choice and had an easy transaction.

Thanks Diamond Jewelers for helping us. I will be back. I own a Vacation Rental - Sand Dollar #9 -Right Foot Riveria - Gulf Shores and will be referring my guest your way for that perfect souvenir.

resp.text: Janet, thank you for the sweet message. So glad we could help you with your jewelry needs and we appreciate the referrals 💕

name: Kelli McKee
text: Always a pleasure!  Watch repair on multiple watches and removed links while I waited.  Plus it smells wonderful.  They have a candle for sale that is to die for!  Amazing staff.

name: sumatra drayton
text:
Stephanie was super nice and very helpful.
They have a great selection of Pandora charms. I just love my Gulf Shores charm!

resp.text: You're so sweet Sumatra! It was a pleasure helping you! I hope you enjoy your charm! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Take Care! Stephanie

name: Linda Hallmark
text: Always shop here during our trips to the Shrimp Festival. Great selection of Pandora charms and jewelry. Staff is very friendly and helpful which makes shopping enjoyable. Jewelry is reasonably priced.

name: Kyle H
text: Perfect store.. visited to look around with my wife. Went back in to buy a pair of ear rings, was given a cute gift bag. Looks great, she will be very very happy.

name: Lisa Fourroux
text: I've had great experiences with jewelry repair. I purchase my Pandora gifts at Diamond Jewelers, as their customer service and variety of Pandora make my shopping experience worthwhile. The staff is professional and attentive.

name: Lisa Gentry
text: This is the best place to get Pandora! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly.....my go to at Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you Lisa💝 We appreciate you

name: Cynthia Mayo
text: I came in looking for a Pandora bracelet for my mother.   Lorrie Kruk was amazing!  She took time to show me all of the different charms and clips, helping me put together the PERFECT bracelet for my mom!  I am so excited and can’t wait to give it to her.  Thank you Lorrie and Diamond Jewelers!

name: Ed Rawle
text: Staff was polite, very helpful and friendly! Five star service!

resp.text: Thank you Ed! We appreciate the positive feedback

name: Sue Foskett
text: They gave me a fair price to fix my rings.  Thank goodness I came in that day or I would have lost my main diamond.  I had not had my prongs checked in some time and won't make that mistake again.

name: Eric Saxe
text: Great place and great people to do business with. They go out of their way to make you feel exceptional. Would definitely buy from them again.

resp.text:
Thank you, Eric for your business! It was a pleasure helping you! We look forward to seeing you in November! Take Care!
Stephanie

text: My daughter's Pandora bracelet was lost a few months ago. name: Cassi Wolski
text: I cannot say enough things about this jeweler! They have a beautiful high quality selection. We worked with Stephanie and she was so sweet patient and professional.  We purchased a new setting for my engagement ring solitaire while we were vacationing there and my solitaire fell out(after 10 years). They helped me select the perfect ring. We put it in layaway as our 10th anniversary was in December(this happened in June). I forgot to snap a picture of it while we were there so I called Stephanie and she happily got it out of the safe and put it on her own finger and sent me pictures via text message. She went above and beyond! We were shopping with our kids and they offered them chocolates and water. We called to have my diamond placed in the new ring on Wednesday of this week and they placed it on the same day we called and overnighted the ring to me for free. I live 6 hours from Gulf Shores. It was at my door the next morning. It is so beautiful! I am so thankful we went there to see about getting my original ring repaired and ended up with a gorgeous new ring that has special meaning since it was purchased at one of my favorite vacation spots. If you need a jeweler you can trust and who has a gorgeous selection give them a try. 👍🏼👍🏼

name: Graham Berry
text: I have been in this store multiple times and received excellent service in the past but due to the service that I recently received I will not be returning. When I arrived to get a quote from the jeweler the woman behind the counter was exceptionally rude and condescending. While speaking with the jeweler the woman continued to make rude and unnecessary comments and even told the jeweler to have me take the products elsewhere. I left the store feeling inadequate and even embarrassed. Based solely on this experience, I will not be returning and would not recommend this business.

resp.text:
Graham,

I just read your review, and I wanted to apologize from the bottom of my heart for your experience yesterday.  I’m sorry I didn’t realize that you had been in.  I know the situation was not handled in the best manner, but I will say the store was short three employees yesterday making for a very hectic day.  I feel certain the associate was feeling overwhelmed and it was not intentional by any means.   I know you and I had a great rapport, and I hope that you will let us make it right in the future.

name: K M
text: My daughter had her heart set on an Eva Lindel gown and La Mariee Bridal is an exclusive vendor. We made a 2 hour drive from Birmingham and so glad we did! Stephanie rolled out the red carpet for us as we arrived with a dream dress in mind.  After trying on several dresses by this designer and others we chose another style.  I just ordered the dress with some custom, special order modifications. Stephanie was very prompt in getting pricing from designer. Again, so glad we made the trip and look so forward to seeing my daughter in her Eva Lindel dream dress!

name: ashley koopman
text: Went today to see about dresses. I was extremely nervous, but Stephanie was awesome and accommodating. If you're looking for a dress, I would recommend this place!

name: Janay Hobson
text: Heba was extremely helpful! I would recommend this bridal shop to other brides to be any day.

name: Haleigh Woodard
text:
This was by far the best Bridal Salon experience I had while shopping for a wedding dress! I went to many different places, but nowhere made me feel as comfortable as La Mariée. The buyer/owner, Stephanie, is amazing to work with! She is so accommodating, and made the entire process as stress-free as possible.

She stocks wedding dresses, bridesmaid dresses, and prom dresses. If you are shopping for a wedding dress (or any kind of formal dress, for that matter) I would absolutely suggest checking out La Mariée! You won't regret it.

name: Lynn
text: La Mariée is such an amazing bridal salon! I came all the way from Los Angeles to show my family dresses while I was in town visiting, and we couldn’t have been more blown away by the quantity and variety of dresses, how well-put-together and lovely the salon was (even though they’re still so new), and how amazing Stephanie is. I truly can’t say enough wonderful things about this place, Stephanie will make sure you have a perfect experience from beginning to end, with gowns that cater to brides and tastes of all varieties!

name: Heather Burnette
text: This past weekend, I went wedding dress shopping at La Mariee Bridal in Madison, AL and had the best experience ever. Stephanie was so attentive, professional, fun and knew exactly what I wanted. From the moment I walked through the door, Stephanie helped me look through all the dresses, she knew exactly where to go after asking what I had in mind. There is a ton of dresses and very affordable prices. She assisted me throughout my time there and made it an unforgettable experience. I definitely recommend this place for a bride, bridesmaid, and mothers! I also seen some young girls in there homecoming shopping also.

name: kathleen dubey Davis
text: I tried there lasagna today and it was amazing! Definite go to place for catering or even family dinners you can pick up and bring home! Excited to try the other casseroles and choices in the future!

name: Jennifer Susman
text: This place is insanely good.  I'm normally not one for "lunch cafes" but I truly enjoy coming here.  Try anything off of the Clark's Kitchen menu and you will be glad you did!  The food is delicious, the restaurant is clean, service is fabulous, internet is free- what more can I say?  Love it here.  I'll be back tomorrow...again!

name: Doris Lepoma
text: I had Seafood Gumbo, It was just perfect,,,Almost like the Gumbo my husband and my mother-in law makes. It was a welcome treat foe  both me and my son. Also  perfect day to have our lunch outside/sidewalk. The pansies are beautiful.

name: Tommy Evans
text: Walked in to a decent atmosphere, pleasant enough staff, but we waited for 40 minutes for two small orders. I got half of what was ordered, my girlfriend didn't even get hers. And we wound up getting a refund and leaving. Short staffed or no they could have warned us, we wasted an entire afternoon and got nothing for it. Don't eat here. It was just bad.

name: ImUrUncleDaddy
text: Good food, ok prices, fast service, great deserts, and even have take home meals. Take home meals are great being a college student because it's enough to feed me all week. Stop by at least once a week now.

name: Destiny L
text:
I am a long time customer of Camile's, not because of the food, but because it is right next door to campus. I sometimes like to sit and grab a bite between classes. The food is bit bland, but I have never had any problems with my order. One day I did and was treated horribly for the complaint. I ordered the Camile club with no mayo. When I received my sandwich, it had mayo. So, I calmly went back up and explained that I didn't want mayo. I was told it could be fixed.

While waiting on my sandwich, I noticed the staff watching me and speaking quietly, but I ignored it. 5 minutes later I was called back and when I went to check my sandwich again, I noticed the residue from mayo. It looked as if someone had wiped the mayo off and changed the bread. Again, calmly, I went back up (once again noticing the staff snickering) and asked to speak to the manager for a refund. Said-manager whose name I couldn't get, claimed she was there the whole time they "remade" my sandwich and it was fresh. I told her that couldn't be the case because it was now cold, it took her less time to make it than originally and I showed her a piece of lettuce that had mayo in it.

She then rudely asked me if I still had my receipt, which I did. I was given a refund, but I don't appreciate the way I was treated. If I'm paying for a meal, I expect it to made the way I requested it. I didn't ask them to make me a sandwich befitting God. I just didn't want mayo.  I am never stepping foot into that cafe again.

name: donrico browne
text: Love it friendly staff and the food was delicious  prices very affordable  definitely  would dine in again!!! Worth sharing

name: C M
text: Food was fast! I got a burger, which had melty cheese, great ground beef, and crisp lettuce and tomatoe. Also got a fruit cup that was fresh! My buddy got a poboy. It looked great, had normal sized shrimp for a restaurant that is not specifically seafood. Will be back. Prices a bit high, but again it's quality food, not fast food.

text: Good food, great people, nice atmosphere for lunch.

text: Food was decent but I expected more.  I ordered a turkey habanero sandwich but there was no spicy-ness at all.

name: Lacey Hearndon
text: I got married May 2021, I can not say enough good things about the venue as well as the people who run it. They were flexible, never told me no (what a bride never wants to hear), and helped in every way they could. They guided the party and made sure everything ran smoothly. Chad and Lindsey even jumped in and cut our cake when they saw the opportunity to help. They even cleaned up all our decorations and organized them so our packing would be easier on us the next day. The property itself was stunning. Very accommodating and had plenty of room for the bridal party. I wouldn’t change a thing. Best experience I’ve ever had!

resp.text: Thanks so much Lacey! Your kind words and review means so much to us. It’s was an absolutely joy to work with you and Ethan on your beautiful wedding. Being apart of your wedding was a true honor. Thank you again.

name: Well Nested
text: I coordinated a wedding here that was planned for April of 2020 but got rescheduled to September of 2020. The venue owner was wonderful to work with in both planning and rescheduling due to the pandemic. When the time finally came, it was a beautiful event at a perfect venue. Triple T Farms had everything we needed for a gorgeous wedding weekend, and the amenities made everything easy. The weekend of, the owner and the venue coordinator made things easy and stress free. There had even been a hurricane the week prior to the September date and they’d worked extremely hard to make sure the property was picture perfect for the wedding. I highly recommend Triple T Farms for your next event.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind review!!   It means so much to us that you took  the time to leave us one. We are grateful for it. Thank you!!

name: Sheri Garriga
text: I have the pleasure of personally knowing the owner of Triple T Farms. Chad, the owner, is a dedicated and hard worker. He is loyal and trustworthy. You can depend on him  and his staff to help make your special day even more memorable. Triple T Farms is a breath taking, picture perfect venue. From the natural beauty of the colorful flowers and trees, to the glistening pond,  and  rustic barn, this is a must see! I recommend anyone planning a wedding or a special event to have it at this hidden treasure. You won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your amazing review Sheri!!  We are grateful you took the time to leave us such kind words.

name: Brooke Ponder
text: I would recommend this venue to anyone and everyone! We got married on May 22nd at Triple T farm Wedding Venue. It was the most perfect day. Everything went so smooth. Chad and Jennifer are the sweetest people to work with. They will make sure you are taken care of and they will take the stress off of you. They stay in contact with you throughout the process to make sure you do not have any questions or concerns. Very responsive whenever you need something. The venue is beautiful. There are different spots you can choose for your ceremony and they are all perfect. The reception barn is gorgeous. The lights are already strung up in the barn and the tables are set out however you want them. You have the option of choosing the bridal house and the grooms cabin to stay in the night before your wedding and night of. We chose to do so and  it was so easy for all of the bridesmaids to already be at the venue the morning of because we all spent the night in the bridal house. We stayed the night of our wedding as well! Everything about this place is perfect!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review and kind words Brooke! It was such a joy and honor to be a part of you and Logan’s special day. We are so grateful for the opportunity to share your beautiful wedding with you and your families. Triple T Farm and family wished you both a lifetime of love and happiness.

name: Adrienne Tate
text: Beautiful location. Chad and Jennifer are very knowledgeable and will answer all the questions that you have about your wedding dreams

resp.text: Thanks so much Adrienne! We are so happy you come to visit with us. Hope to have you back soon!

text: Triple T Farm is the absolute BEST place to have your wedding! Chad and Jennifer make you feel just like you’re at home. They make your special day so easy for you. I had nothing to worry about from the moment I booked with Triple T! I recommend anyone to get married here!! It’s great for any event. To top it all off, it’s absolutely gorgeous! Triple T, making dreams come true!!

text: My son and now daughter in law were married at Triple T Farms this past weekend, April 10, 2021. It is definitely a hidden gem. Their day was absolutely perfect. Chad and Jennifer went above and beyond to help before, during and after the ceremony all while making you feel like family. Amazing atmosphere. I would highly recommend Triple T Farms for your wedding or any occasion!

resp.text: Thanks so much Heather! We had a great time with all of you at Garrett and Brandy beautiful wedding. We are grateful to be apart of their special day. Thanks again.

text: We used Triple for our daughter’s graduation party. It was perfect. Chad was easy to work with and answered all my questioned. The facility was pretty much already decorated and had plenty of parking and seating for our 150 guests. We will definitely use Triple T again.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review Jimmy. It means so much to us that you and your guests enjoyed your time at our farm. We can’t wait to have you back. Thanks again.

text:
3.) After we put in an order for an arrangement we called back to add to the order. An employee who answered the phone asks for our personal information. We gave it. Figure that one out.  About five hours they found our order - but only because we were persistent – believe me (N.Y persistent). text: I have used Pre Events for many work events and they are fantastic. All of their staff is great and easy to work with. Items are delivered on time and in great condition!

name: Fountainview Mansion
text: I have really enjoyed working with Janiee and Katie.  They are very professional, kind spirit, and timely with their information.  The staff is always very professional while on site and delivery and set up service are top-notch!  Thank you!   Leigh Hardy. Fountainview Mansion

name: Skylar Albritton
text: I worked with Mary Louise on a styled shoot in Auburn in August 2016. She set up everything so that it was so easy for me. I showed up for pick up, gave them my account number, they loaded my car + I was set to go. Drop off was as much of a breeze + their farm table + ghost chairs were perfect for my fun bridal shower shoot. Every member of their staff was friendly + helpful. Plus, their rentals photographed BEAUTIFULLY.

name: Chad Cleveland
text: Great service and awesome equipment.  highly recommend for event rental in Auburn/Opelika.

name: Wayne Hobbs
text: Most of the security lights don't work

resp.text: Hi Wayne!  Thanks for letting us know,  but we don’t actually offer security lights as part of inventory or services. Please give us a call if you’d like to discuss, as we’d be glad to help resolve if we can.

name: Katherine Carlisle
text: Ok

name: Samantha Eubanks
text: We planned our wedding in just 3 months from 11 hours away, and Chris was so accommodating and helpful! I tend to ask a lot of questions, and he always answered them quickly. He allowed us to customize our wedding how we wanted, and walked us through each step, helping us to make sure it went off without a hitch! His photographer, Hannah, was amazing and so sweet. Our wedding was perfect, better than we could have ever imagined. I would happily send anyone to Something Blue Beach Weddings!

name: Gracie Brewer
text: If you are thinking of doing a beach wedding at Orange Beach search no more. We used Something Blue Beach Weddings in 2018 and I wouldn’t change a single thing!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Abbi Queen
text: Chris was responsive and walked us through all aspects of the wedding in a timely manner. Zach, our officiant, led us through some of the most heart felt vows i have heard. My guests and those we sent videos to- we very touched by his warm words. Definitely like he had known us forever. And Hanaha our photographer- was patient creativr and she adjusted to changes quicky (lighting, or dealing with other beach goers in our shots.) I can see how this would have been very hectic without their expertise. Im grateful for them. The only issues we had were parking g and that was beyond their. Control. They come highly recommended.

name: Krystal Tobin
text: I highly recommend something blue weddings.  It was more affordable than the other places we looked at, and Chris was always available to speak with.  We booked about a month before we wanted to get married and everything from planning to payment was stress free.  The ceremony and decorations were beautiful, exactly what we wanted.

resp.text: Thank you so much Krystal. It was a pleasure meeting you guys.

name: Jennie Muth
text:
Was so much more than we expected.  Chris and his crew did a fantastic job.  We wanted simple and that’s exactly what we got.  I highly recommend them for your beach wedding needs... Thank you so much for a perfect day!

Brian and Jennie Muth

name: Noah Cantwell
text: Chris, Zach, and Katelyn were top of the line. They were professional and down to earth all at the same time. They were very considerate of any questions and concerns. I would recommend them to anybody that wants a nice zero stress beach wedding.

name: Courtney Mathis
text: Chris was great! I called to schedule a last minute wedding (we're talking less than 2 weeks notice) and he fit me in and basically handled everything! He answered every question I had, answered every text immediately. He even gave us pictures of where to turn when heading to the ceremony location so we knew where we were going! And the photography is breath taking. I would 100% recommend them to anyone who wants a beach wedding! They're wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: dontae johnson
text: My husband and I chose Chis and his team to host our wedding and we are glad that we did. The entire experience was amazing from beginning to end. All questions were answered in a timely manner and everyone was professional. I would definitely recommend him and his staff. Thanks Chris for manning my dreams come true.

name: Martin DAVIS
text: We could not have asked for a better experience planning a wedding.  Very stress free and Chris was available at all times to answer any questions.   Chris and his staff are absolutely amazing to work with and made our wedding day so special and we made beautiful memories that will last a lifetime.

name: Kristin Graham
text: Something Blue Beach Weddings did a fantastic job! We couldn’t have asked for a more perfect setting or ceremony. The pictures turned out amazing and we hope to schedule family pictures soon. If you want a meaningful, non stressful wedding, contact Something Blue Beach Weddings!! I promise you will not regret making that choice!

name: Emileigh Pope
text: Best value and best photography on the Gulf Coast for weddings- I did my research! Chris handles all the details for you and will answer texts and calls quickly- great for someone like me who was planning from far away. So easy and low stress to plan, for a very affordable price. The ceremony and Chris’ prepared readings were lovely. I can’t emphasize enough how special the day was! Their photographers are unparalleled!! Thank you Something Blue Beach Weddings for giving us the wedding of our dreams!!

name: Jenn Estrada
text: Our wedding was perfect! Zach and the photographer exceeded my expectations and gave us a beautiful beach wedding

name: Star Gazer
text: Fantastic people to work with. They made my wedding day enjoyable and hassle free.

resp.text: Thank you Brandy.  It truly was a pleasure.

name: Ben W
text: Chris made everything so easy and Kelly took amazing pictures. Our wedding was everything we wanted it to be and was so much fun! Stress free was also a big plus.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Paula N
text: They took care of all of the details for my son and his bride's wedding. Everything ran smoothly. Photos they took were breathtakingly gorgeous. They know the best time to create the perfect sunset wedding.

name: Halie Belleau
text: I'm so glad that we chose Something Blue Beach Weddings for our big day. Chris was amazing to work with and made everything stress free. If you ever decide to have a beach wedding, Something Blue should be your one and only call.

name: Ricky Review's
text: Have your beach wedding here!The ceremony was incredible!  Chris took care of everything! He took all the stress and weight of the ceremony away. He worked with us on everything. He was so easy to get ahold of ,had a wealth of knowledge, and gave great feedback and suggestions.  We had a lot of bad luck the morning of the wedding and were dealing with an emergency. We we're afraid the stress and anxiety would carry over to our wedding. But Chris's calmess , kindness and professionalism took all those negative feelings away from the moment we got to the location, to make the most amazing ceremony we could dream of. Our photographer was also top notch and patient and amazing. She was able to get the most stunning pictures even with our screaming toddler that wouldn't let my wife go for more than a few seconds. We we're so impressed with something blue beach weddings. These people are the epitome of professionalism! Thank you both for the amazing time!!!!!Planning a wedding alone is scary enough. "Something Blue" saved the day and more! Let them rescue you as well!

resp.text: Thank you Ricky!

name: John Turner
text: did such a great job on such a short notice. Thank you guys so much for helping make it a great time!!

name: ashley salgado
text: If I could give this place a 0 star review I would. Never was there a verbal or written contract on when the suits where suppose to be return. NEVER did they mention that the suits had a late fee. They had the audacity to argue with underage kids and try to threaten to “call the authorities” when they were on the wrong. horrible place. 0/10 never recommend.

name: Dorenda Allen
text: The groomsmen paid half of what their rental was and following the pandemic the wedding was canceled. They were notified a month and a half before the wedding and promised to get refunds return but has yet to do so. Each time I call,  the owner was sick, then she was on bed rest, then she fell and broke her arm, and now they are just not answering. The voicemail is even full therefore you can't leave a message. It's really sad to say you are a professional business but not in the business of treating your customers right. Im going to consult with my lawyer. I wouldn't ever refer someone of such poor professionalism and poor communication skills. These people won't call back even after leaving many messages. It has been over 8 months that I have been calling them and yes they hour are conflicting.

name: Justin Chiriatti
text:
voicemail and website state that they are open until 5pm.  The business' answering machine tells people that call that they are open until 5pm.  I show up at 4:10 to give this local business my money, but they were closed.
A tiny sign in the window tells you they close at 4.  Closing at 5 is ridiculous enough being that most people work until 5pm.  Also, The 'emergency number" has a full voicemail consistently.  These people make it very difficult to give them your money.  I'm going to Madison or Huntsville from now on.

name: James Turner
text: Ordered tuxedos a few months in advance put a down payment and went to pick up on the wedding day and they didn't have them in stock had to go to jcpenney instead

resp.text: Hi James, we would love to talk to you about this situation. Please email us at michaelmasontux@gmail.com. Thank you.

name: Stephanie Turner
text:
I ordered my wedding dress and my tux months ahead of  time I went to pick it up they did not have it told me to come back the next day that they would have.  I came back the next day they did not have it ........I ended up with my gown but no tuxedo at all ....it was my 25 th year vow renewal & it was the next day.   I ended up with no tuxedo or anything because of them.
I WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THEM TO ANY ONE EVER. THEY DIDN'T DO ANYTHING TO MAKE IT RIGHT.  THERE NOT VERY PROFESSIONAL .... CHECK YOUR ORDERS IN ADVANCE

name: nicole lewis
text: I went shopping for my wedding dress on a day when the shop wasn't open, but the owner let me look around and i found my dress. It was lovely. The service was very good. It's definitely worth a look.

name: Donna King
text: The 2 ladies that helped with my granddaughters prom dress was so sweet & very positive. Thanks for your kindness.  Made her feel great about herself in her dreas.Will return next yr. for prom dress. Thank you , she was beautiful in her dress.

name: Pam Ward
text: It’s Ridiculous that they do not stay open as stated on their business hours posted online and on their door. Guess they don’t care if they lose customers. This has happened twice. I’ll never make an attempt to shop here again.

name: Christina Alvarado
text: All of my bridesmaids' dresses and groomsmen's tuxes were ordered through Michael Mason Bridal. They worked with me through picking out which brand, color, and material my bridesmaids' dresses would be, and they also helped find vests and ties for the groomsmen that matched the bridesmaids' dresses. My circumstances were especially difficult because almost every single person in the wedding party was in a different state, and two were even in another country. I let my bridesmaids choose what style dress they wanted within the brand, color, and material I picked out, and Michael Mason was always very accommodating in taking orders and measurements for all the different styles of dresses. If I had it to do over, I would use Michael Mason again!

name: aundavis
text: They really helped my mom and I during my wedding. I didn't buy my dress from them but I could have. They had one sales associate named Peyton who really did a great job of taking care of us. I would recommend them to people especially in the Decatur area.

name: Heather Blankenship
text: Horrible customer service. The owner is rude. I was told by my salesperson that I could put a deposit on a dress that was the last of its kind and that I could get my money back if I changed my mind about it.  When I called to find out what the process is to get a refund of my $500 down payment the owner stated “All sales are final” and “You should have read your contract”. I didn’t sign a contract. All I signed was a sales slip that requested my name and contact information. The dress never left their store and no alterations have been made. I will never do business here again and you really shouldn’t either.

name: Brooke Lindsey
text: My husband rented his tux for our wedding from here, the tux looked great and the staff was help with getting him what he needed.

name: Joe McAlpin
text: Great staff.  Got me into a tux with less than 24 hour notice.  See Phillis Daniels

name: Mik S
text:
We rented a tux for my son and basically nothing fit.   The ladies who worked there went to work and got a tux out of the back and hemmed the sleeves and pants to make it fit.
The store closed at 5 but they stayed late till 545pm to make it work .
So even though there was problem they went to extra effort to make it right

name: Bianca Williams
text: Everyone was so helpful and friendly. My bridesmaid dresses came in faster than expected.

name: StewReview
text: Great place ! Very informative and great customer service. I highly recommend !!!! I've used this store before and never once had a bad experience.

name: Karnardo Jones
text: Rented tux for my best wedding nice friendly

name: Shanna Coan
text:
We rented a tux last year for prom and the girl was very nice but did not set the return date with us.  She just said to return the tux Monday or Tuesday.   When we took it back on Tuesday, they charged us $20.  Ok.  Maybe I got it wrong, I thought.  So, this year we go on  a Friday and get fitted to rent a jacket and vest to the tune of $92!  We could have practically gotten the whole shebang for that.  Then we realize that my son told her the wrong date!  We call them on Monday to correct it only to be charged an extra  $20!  So $112 just to rent a jacket and vest.  So, now, he just went to pick it up for prom TOMORROW NIGHT and they have sent it back!!!  We paid the extra for them to "hold it" and they sent it back anyeay!
Ridiculous! Go here if you want extra charges for no reaso, if you want to pay a lot for a rental OR if you want poorly handled business.  BEYOND  VERY DISAPPOINTED!

name: Amanda Mitchell
text: bought my wedding dress from here and it was the best experience !

name: Amy Smith
text: Horrible!   My son rented his Senior Prom tux from them when he put the tux on friday night the coat sleeves hung past his finger tips, the shirt was huge and the pa ts hung on him.  The only thing that fit was the shoes.  I called and complained Friday when he was getting ready the girl who answered the phone didn't even say Michael mason's  I had to ask if I had the right number. I told her what was wrong she said when I brought it back today that they would make it right, they offered me 25.00!   25.00 for screwing up my sons senior prom, for him having to wear something 2 if jot 3 time too big for him, really..... I would not rent a tux for my dog much less any one else from these people.

text: This place has good products available and the younger girl who works here is very helpful, however the owners are very rude and do not manage the businesses they own very well. Extremely unprofessional and drama filled. I would not recommend giving them your business.

This is childishness and just goes to show your professional behavior. Please know that this is public and any employer you are hoping to get a new job from can see this and it doesn’t look very good on you for bashing a business that 1) you didn’t work for 2) shopped at 3) your best friend works here, 4) you QUIT another business not this one. So please take some mature advise and stop acting like a child who didn’t get their way.

name: Leslie Henderson
text: Friendly staff who are always ready to give advice on that perfect outfit for the new season

name: Courtney Ware
text: Very rude owners and not trustworthy  bash me idc never worked here don’t want to😂

name: Greg Schneider
text: Nice folks! Buy local!!

name: Brooklyn Carden
text: Love it here! Highly recommend!!!!! Stop in today!!!

name: Samantha Zorn
text: The owners know what they are doing! They have great taste and  will go out of their way to not only give you the look you desire, but they are also accommodating to your schedule. We have NEVER had a bad experience here and we’ve used them for everything....  prom, pageants, work, gifts! They really do dress the best!! I definitely recommend shopping at Elan!

name: Julie Stewart
text: If I could give one star, I definitely would. My daughter has never been "prom dress shopping", so this was a special event for her. We drove 2+ hours to Elan, and we were greeted as we entered the store. Everything else from that point was terrible. My daughter tried on several gowns and the salesgirl held the train on each dress as I took a photo of my daughter in it - never one time did she ever ask us not to take photos of the gowns. After my daughter had tried on about 4-5 dresses, one of the other salesgirls commented "we don't really like for y'all to take photos of the tags", to which I said I was sorry and we stopped taking photos of the tags on the gowns. I was unsure why, but I assume it is because their gowns are marked up well over retail. After my daughter tried on 1-2 more gowns, an older lady walked over to us and very rudely yelled at my daughter if she was taking pictures she would have to delete all of them before leaving the store. She also said "I know two of my girls have already told you to stop taking pictures". This is untrue, as the only person who had previously said anything was the salesgirl (not ours) that said not to take photos of the tags. I could see my daughter was very visibly upset, so we said thank you and left the store. They lost my business forever, as well as everyone I know that I can tell about our experience. My daughter commented when we left that she never wants to go prom dress shopping ever again, so I am really upset that these incredibly rude girls have ruined this experience for my daughter.

resp.text: This customer was not treated anything but wonderful in our store. She was greeted upon arrival and employees spent hours catering to her every need.  If mistreated the entire time no one would spend 2 hours in a store. Upon entry into our store on the front door and posted at every dressing room are NO photography signs. That is our store policy due to customers like this one.  Once a gown is purchased you are more than welcome to take all the photos you would like. This specific customers after being asked twice not to take photos continued to take pictures of Gown tags and photos of gowns. If you plan to purchase a gown in our store there would be no need to take photos of our tags. All of our gowns are priced the same as any other retailer so you will not find it cheaper unless it is a used product. After being asked repeatedly to not take photos and the customer blatantly in front of employees & other customers continuing to not follow store policy she was asked very politely by the store manager to please delete any photos taken in our store as it is against store policy. No one ever raised their voice at this customer nor were they mistreated in any way.  They were kindly asked to follow the store policy like every other customer. This customer then left our store after taking up hours of employees’ time, trying on our product, finding her correct size and went on resale sites posting exactly what size she needed and photos of herself in our merchandise in our store trying to find it at a used price. We are a small business trying to succeed after a struggle with Covid and customers like this one are the reason we have store policies in place to try to combat people taking advantage of hard working individuals and businesses.

name: Charlotte Williams
text: After a problem with my daughters original prom dress purchased elsewhere, these lady's were able to save the day at practically the last minute with a new dress in a color she wanted. They were also able to do a minor alteration so the dress fit better.

name: Erika Bryan
text: This store has one of the best gown selections in Alabama. I was very pleased with the service I was given. I will definitely go there for all my dress needs!

(Translated by Google) Elan

name: April Robertson-Townsend
text: I worked with Paige. She was warm,  very helpful and the process was so easy. I set up my appointment on line, I received a reminder,  I picked out some dresses on line and wrote them down. She told me which ones they had and didn't have. She showed me similar styles, I tried them on and found one I loved which didn't break the bank! Very Happy with my experience.

resp.text: Hi April, we are thrilled to hear how pleased you were with the service Paige at our Tuscaloosa store provided you during your recent visit. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your memorable experience with us. Best wishes, Jessica H.

name: Alex Krieger
text: My stylist, Tiffany was fantastic! Every dress I tried on was gorgeous and she was honest about how she felt about all of them. She knew exactly the kind of dress I wanted and she was able to understand exactly what I wanted. She was incredibly personable and didn’t rush me at all. I would definitely go to her if I needed anything else for my wedding!

resp.text: Hi Alex, congratulations on your upcoming nuptials! We couldn't be happier to hear how Tiffany exceeded your expectations during your recent visit to our Tuscaloosa location! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your exceptional and memorable experience with us. Best Wishes, Christine G.

name: Penni Garner
text: I had the best time. The lady who helped me was amazing. She was so friendly she helped me try on some beautiful dresses and I found my dress with her help. I feel in love with my dress the first time I tried it on.  Thank y'all so much

resp.text: Hi Penni and congratulations on finding a dress that you love! It sounds like you had an amazing time working with your consultant. We will make sure that she sees your kind words! Best wishes, Ellice J.

name: Kammie Kinsey
text: Celine was my consultant and she made my experience at David’s Bridal amazing without her I don’t think I would have made it through all 3 appointments. I did say “Yes” to a dress that I was able to make my own. Thank you Celine for everything and best of luck to you and your future.

resp.text: Hello Kammie, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that Celine was able to provide you with such a wonderful experience! Should you need any additional assistance in the future, please let us know. Best wishes, Christine G.

name: Sumra Hayden
text: This was my first time looking for my wedding dress!  I was greeted with welcoming smiles. Within two hours, Alex, the bridal associate, along with my Mother and soon to be Mother-in-law, helped me find the perfect dress for my wedding day for a really good price!  If you are looking to find your wedding dress today, do not hesitate to stop by David's Bridal!  You will absolutely feel beautiful and welcome.

resp.text: Hi Sumra, congratulations on finding your perfect dress! We are so excited that Alex was able to assist you in making your bridal dreams come true. We would love to see this perfect dress, and invite you to visit our Facebook page to share pictures of the big day! Best wishes, Ellice J.

name: riamusicministry
text: This was a 50th Wedding Anniversary with a bridal party from 5 different states with 5 different sizes, shoes and accessories. This is the place to handle anything. All dresses and shoes we're sent to the girls' homes on schedule. The alterations were to be done at the local David's Bridal Shop near them. Any issue was rectified immediately by the Tuscaloosa management, especially Shanty. An example, the shoe size was not right, they had it shipped to the women's front door. But more importantly, their calm attitude and work ethic  was of great value. Kept the bride and girls at peace as details were worked out quickly. Everything worked out lovely and everyone looked great! Thank you Shanty and staff. We had a wonderful time working with you.

name: Jillian Katherine Carter Schultz Fife
text:
This place and the people who work there are awesome. I'm not into the girlie girl stuff yet they made me feel at home even in a dress.Thanks to all who worked with me...
Much love and God Bless
Jillian

resp.text: Hello Jillian! The fact that our team was able to make you feel comfortable on your recent visit is fantastic! thank you for taking the time to leave us such kind words. We will make sure to pass them along! Best wishes, Ellice J.

name: Alli Pocock
text: Great experience! unfortunately they are closing. They just got liquidated so everything is on a GREAT discount. The ladies were still extremely helpful and very nice.

name: Deja Williams
text: Paige was great and patient. She also seemed to have a good working relationship with the other associates in the store. She took care of my bridesmaids and gave me her information in case I had questions.

resp.text: Hi Deja, thank you so much for your star rating! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with us! If you need any assistance in the future or if you would like to tell us more, please send us an email to dbcares@dbi.com. Thank you, Christine G.

name: Diane Goodwin
text:
The associate was trying to help us and someone else. We did not get the attention/service we deserved or needed. The associate quoted wrong price.
I didn't get a welcome feel from no one working in the store.
We had to order the dress. It did come in the date that was promised.
When we picked up the dress we were not offered to try the dress on.

resp.text: Hello Diane. We are sorry that your experience with us did not meet expectations. Despite needing to work with more than one party at a time, we want all of our guests to have an experience that is personal and enjoyable. We are sorry for this and will work to improve our service. Thank you, Ellice J.

name: Kayla Crum
text: Anna was great! She did my dress alteration, was very good at describing what she was doing & why she was doing it. Friendly and really good at her job. :)

resp.text: Hi Kayla ! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with our team! Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Best, BrittianyD.

name: Nicole Brown
text: My consultant was awesome! Very helpful and super nice. Although I know they are running a business I wish they wouldn't try to up-sale so much as it becomes annoying. Also, I was shocked at how much the accessories cost! Over I had a good experience.

resp.text: Hi Nicole, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, we will be sure to pass this along right away, please let us know if you need any assistance in the future. Thank you, Kristen W.

name: Anna Terry
text: It was super fast and easy. All the girls were very nice. They even found a coupon for me to use on the dress!

text: My visit to David's Bridal was amazing! From the time I walked in the door from the time I left I felt very comfortable and important. If you visit try to book with Tiffany.....she's the BEST!!!

resp.text: Hello Nikita! We couldn't be happier to hear that from beginning to end, our team has provided you and your party with excellent service. Thank you for sharing your many compliments for Tiffany! Best wishes, Ellice J.

name: Jamekia Glenn
text: I walked in & the Associates were very friendly! I think Quinnwas awesome! She was attentive & knowledgeable! She tried to answer ever question I had. I was disappointed that the store didn’t carry many options in my size or the items from my favorites. There should be a way to know if the store has the dress to even try on! But other than that, my experience was good!

resp.text: Hi Jamekia, thank you so much for sharing your star rating, we are so sorry that we could not provide you with a full 5 star experience. We would love to hear more about which areas need some improvement so that we can provide you with a better experience in the future! text: My consultant Brandy was amazing when I was trying on dresses, I was disappointed with the selection in my size, and having to go with an option blind while still agreeing to pay extra for alterations. After the dress was purchased their consultant Shanta was very unhelpful. I guess it didn't matter to her my dress is the wrong color it's bought and paid for.

resp.text: Hello Keelie, Thank you for taking the time to compliment Brandy on the assistance she provided. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. If you may need any further assistance do not hesitate to reach out to us again. Thank you, Cierra S.

text: I wish I could remember the girl's name, but she was so helpful in helping me find the perfect dress for my son's wedding.  She was patient, thoughtful, and had suggestions to help me.

text: Great people. A little pushy on trying to make the sale that day, but I understood where they were coming from. They were looking out for me in case the dress went out of stock.

text: First bridal experience and it was amazing!!!! My stylist Tiffany was so great! The whole team was helpful and welcoming.

name: Uni Unicorn
text: Loved it!!!!!  The experience was amazing and the assistant helping me was all smiles I was very part leased and even found my dress

name: Amber Barger
text: I went to David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa on Saturday. I didn't have an appointment. The girls got me right back. Shelby was my stylist & she was awesome. I told her exactly what I wanted; which was a dress with sleeves.  I showed her pictures from online & she found all the dresses. I'm a plus size bride so I was scared; I wouldn't have a lot of selections. I was very wrong; they had dresses in stock for any size bride. Shelby found me three great dresses. There was a dress online that had short sleeves. Shelby let me try on the same dress in strapless & told me she could order it for me with sleeves. Shelby explained payment arrangements & credit options to pay for the dress. Shelby broke everything down in detail for me. Which was very helpful for a new bride with a budget. I was very close to ordering that dress. But, I really wanted to try it on with the sleeves. I was so impressed with David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa; I made an appointment the same day at the David's Bridal in Hoover. I was thinking Hoover would have more dresses with sleeves & possibly have that dress with sleeves to try on. That was the worst idea ever. The store in Hoover is a huge disappointment for David's Bridal. The customer service needs to be reviewed at the Hoover store. The employees at that store are very unprofessional. After the bad experience at the Hoover store; I started reading reviews & asking friends. Apparently that is common for the David's Bridal in Hoover. If I decide to order through David's Bridal, it will definitely be with the Tuscaloosa David's Bridal. Great job David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa.

name: Mariah Moos
text: I loved the experience! My only negative for the day was the limited supply of modest styled dresses for a lower price point.

resp.text: Hello Mariah! We are beyond happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at our store. We appreciate your feedback on our dress selection as well. Best wishes, Ellice J.

text: Celine was amazing, informative, and patient. I highly recommend her and I'm specifically requesting her for my bridal party fitting.
