text: Thank You Martha Rea’s! My mom loves the  flowers I had delivered for her birthday!!  Will definitely buy from you again!

name: Alisha Myrsa
text: Very helpful people.

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart
text: Beautiful arrangements, great customer service.

name: Michael Davis
text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

name: Trish P.
text: They were so helpful & kind. I really appreciate them!!!!

name: William Stone
text: 32 years together and the flowers made it special. great job!!!!

name: Kevin Temple
text: Very nice flowers!

name: leonard gordon
text: Great florist and outstanding service

name: Mary Lynne Wright
text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

name: Austin Cook
text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Justin Stoddard
text: Lisa is amazing lady. Very helpful and positive bout everything. Will take the time to help plan any vacation needs. I enjoy her helping us plan our summer vacations. 5stars can't say one negative thing about her and her services.

resp.text: You are very sweet!  We will  find the perfect opportunities for you and your family!  I am enjoying working with you, Justin!

name: Holly Schneider
text: HANDS DOWN THE BEST TRAVEL AGENT I HAVE EVER WORKED WITH! my honeymoon trip got ruined by the resort, they extended renovations through November (my honeymoon is in September) and they never informed me of the change. I was devastated, I had all this disappointment with covid and now this! Lisa gave me multiple alternative options and worked tirelessly for days to make something work for my fiancé and I. She gets back to you right away and really listens to what you want to give you the greatest experience she can. I would choose her again 10/10 times for any future travel plans.

resp.text: Holly,  thank you for your patience and kindness during this mishap!  I am so glad we could fix it for you and Wes!  You are very sweet! Lisa

name: Pat Greager
text: Lisa planned a exciting & beautiful tour.  I was amazed at how organized everything went "like clock work"!!!  We saw the highlights of Portugal & Spain, as well as the smaller personal parts of the quaint little villages and their people. The hotels, our guides, transportation & food was the best.  It's  easy to see Lisa puts her heart into making the tour something unforgettable for her clients. She's #1 in my book, can't wait to travel with her again. (Thank you Lisa for the TLC)

resp.text: Pat, it was an absolute pleasure working with you and traveling with you!  I can't wait to go somewhere else with you! Lisa

name: Sam J
text: Lisa has been the worst travel planner we have ever had to work with. To begin, she can’t communicate clearly or even spell words correctly, so almost all her interactions with us were incredibly hard to read and understand. Next, she kept emailing us the wrong dates and times for almost everything on the trip. You name it, she messed it up, from flights to shuttles to hotel info. It was unbelievably confusing and frustrating to have to keep clarifying and working through misinformation. Additionally, she has an excuse for everything and can’t take ownership of her mistakes. We never received an apology for one of her many errors. She was pushy, illiterate, lazy, and entitled. I would never recommend her to anyone and have no idea how she has received any positive reviews. This has been a horrible experience for all of us. There were so many problems and we would have been a thousand times better off putting the trip together ourselves. Do yourself the biggest favor and never bring your business to this irresponsible girl.

resp.text: Hello Sarah J.   My sincerest apologies for your bad experience with a travel planner.  But, it isn't me!  I went through all my files today looking for someone with your name and I don't have any client fitting your name.  I also communicate very clearly and am diligent in ensuring I have the correct information for my clients.  I would love to help you if you have travel needs and prove to you that I am actually excellent at my job.  It is sad to me that there are travel planners who aren't proficient at their job.  I am so sorry for your experience.  In addition I am a woman of 60 years not a "girl" with over 20 years in the business.  Whenever I have made a mistake, I always take responsibility for it and make it right.  As I said, you are welcome to reach out to me personally  and I would happily ensure you have a great experience.

name: Tammi Bortner
text: Lisa planned a wonderful trip for us to Riviera Maya in Mexico.   The resort, the food, the staff were all excellent.   A perfect carefree getaway planned by a true professional.   Always a delight to work with!

resp.text: Thank you, Tammi!

name: Taylor Ellis
text: Lisa Tanner is the most knowledgeable travel agent I have ever met! I have not yet booked a trip with her yet, but I definitely will in the near future. She is extremely educated when it comes to travel best practices and planning a trip. I would highly recommend her to help you plan a trip!

resp.text: Thank you!  I look forward to working with you.

name: Catherine Long
text: Castles,cathedrals,wineries,olive farms BARRACAS/ paella classes and dinners to die for. Shopping non stop and oh what about the Flameco/ fun fun group Excellent guides everywhere! Lisa is an amazing  ,strategic,TRAVEL MAKER! ❤️❤️

name: Miracle Azoca
text: So blessed ❤️

resp.text: Thanks, Miracle.  I was happy to work with you!

name: Bernadette Chapple
text:
My husband and I have been patronizing Evening Out Formal Wear for over 25 years! They provide excellent customer service and quality tuxedos. As we celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary in the 26th year, there is only one tuxedo location we would trust with dressing the "Groom". Thank you Evening Out Formal Wear for being exceptional!

~Michael and Bernadette Chapple

name: Marc Wilder
text: Well my wedding day or these pics wouldn’t have been a success without Evening Out! Mr. Salter is top notch with customer service and his attention to the smallest details is the reason I would shop with him again! If any business owner is willing to give you their personal number to ensure your order is fulfilled is A1 in my book! GO DAWGS!

name: Grant Smith
text: Spectacular service, excellent clothing options from simple tuxedos to the more wild look.  Great prices and exceptional quality.  Will come back to evening out for any of my formal clothing needs!!

name: Harris Kenneth
text: Professional, friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable are the best ways I can describe the staff at “Evening Out”. Mr. Salter and his staff are tailored to making sure that you are stepping out in style for your event. My groomsmen and myself went there and thanks to the staff over there we came out looking good. 5/5 stars, highly recommended !!

name: Kierra Eleace
text: My husband and sons both got their suits for our wedding here. They looked amazing for our wedding day!!! The alterations were perfect!I would highly recommend Evening Out to everyone I need of prom or wedding attire.

name: Timothy Bibb
text: I want to start with about how good the customer service was. I forgot the man name but you will remember his face every time you come. He was honest and very nice. He know what you like and help a lot . I came to him my first time over a year ago and he remember his customers. Men warehouse stereotype me and I will never return plus Evening out got better choice with best prices.

name: Karl Cody
text: I was going to go to men’s warehouse where I was expecting to pay between 200$ and 250$ for a tux rental. Instead found Evening Out and not only did they beat the price they shattered the price and my expectations.  If you are looking for a tux rental for yourself or a wedding party this is the place to go no questions asked.  The owner is extremely courteous and knowledgeable on all things tuxedos.  You will be glad you went to Evening Out Formal Wear!

name: Nikki
text: We had such a great experience with our tux rental! Super helpful and friendly staff. I’m a procrastinator by nature so I was a little last minute but they had everything ready in time. I’ll definitely be using them in the future!

name: Kameron Bell
text: Mr. Salter was very nice throughout my whole wedding experience with ordering suits for my wedding. He has a lot of variety and will do same day alterations if needed. 10/10 recommend

name: Cedric Bennett
text: I definitely recommend anyone to come for your formal event . He really get the job done . Definitely left with a smile

name: Karen Stinson
text: Best customer service ever! I spoke with the owner a year before the wedding. 10 months later, I called back and he remembered our color scheme and my fiancé’s  name. If that’s not being attentive than I don’t know what is! Very pleased with the quality and service. We will be back!

name: Ariana Pitts
text: My dress was a very hard dress to find a tux for and this place was definitely amazing! My boyfriend found a suit to match my dress and I’m so in love I definitely recommend this place!!

name: Memendra Page
text: This is the place to go.. He has unique and tailored styles. He has a great selection to choose from. The location is in a good spot and the customer service was superb. There is no place like this.  The other shops are generic. The prices are reasonable and the quality is way better.

name: Josh summey
text: Had a great experience with this company! The guy who owns this spot is extremely friendly and is very quick on alterations and adjustments on suits

name: D Jackson
text: Great experience and even better service. I would recommend Evening Out to anyone who was looking for a tuxedo to rent.

name: Tomica Harris
text: Mr. Kim was amazing from the beginning to the end! He knows his stuff. On our wedding day, all the groomsmen were perfectly fitted and handsome. The groom, MY HUSBAND, was GQ fine standing at the altar. I highly recommend Evening Out Formal Wear and will definitely use them again.

name: Charles Mosely
text: Great experience! They really know what they are doing here! Grade A service, fast, and efficient. Show them what you want and they make it happen!

name: Gloria Hall
text: I highly recommend that you shop with Evening Out! I shopped with them for my son’s prom two years straight I would not go anywhere else! He has everything you need from head to toe! Don’t just shop for Prom any and all occasions! Nice friendly atmosphere!

name: Felix Allen
text: The best place to get your tuxedo in  the Montgomery area. Very friendly, professional and organize when it comes to your desire and look. Most shops have to send your tuxedo off if any problems occur, but evening out will fix it right away and have it right back in 10 mins. Keep up the great job and  greatly appreciate.  #theallens

name: Scoop Salter
text: I walked in and I Loved the atmosphere and the photos selection of all the suites to choose from! I would recommend anyone looking to be fitted for a special night out to make their choice at “EVENING OUT”

name: Brookelynn Smith
text: Great place! They were a ton of help for me and my groom throughout the entire processes. They even rushed the shipping for us so we could have the tuxedos a day early. Very happy with the service of the staff.

name: Krisstopher Floyd
text:
Great customer service, quality work family and friendly environment. If you are looking for a place for your wedding. Guys this is definitely the place to go.
Professional staff and excellent service.

name: andre mitchell
text: Absolutely a great business and is very patient with each and every customer. I highly recommend using Evening Out Formal Wear for your next event.

NO BETTER PLACE TO GO FOR YOUR NEEDS WHEN IT COMES TO YOUR MAN LOOKING BEYOND AMAZING!!!! The even have a full invite and table at my wedding now!!! THANK YOU A MILLION!!

name: Google mail
text: Owner was very friendly and professional! Tuxedos were neat, clean and measured to the t’....We used them for our wedding. We’ll be using them whenever a rental is needed! I definitely recommend them, hands down service!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Angela Washington
text: I absolutely love Evening Out!  I took my son to Men's Wearhouse and ordered a tux, but was prompted by my husband to check out EO.  We not only found the same tuxedo, but we paid far less and was not charged a rush fee, which Men's Wearhouse charges. The tux and accessories were ordered on Thursday morning and received Friday afternoon.  The measurements were exact and the service was superb.  We will definitely be back and will be referring our friends and family to do business with them.

name: Antonio Lucero
text: Professional and courteous.

name: Brock White
text: Great customer service, good quality suits, and great tuxedos.

name: William Headley
text: Professionalism at it's best here guys. Stop wasting your hard earned money on big name shops I.e. Men's wharehouse. Evening out has many more choices without the hassle of paying too much for that big name brand store. Don't worry if you need to call in your sizes as they are spot on with measurements. Nothing like great hometown service.

text: I love Evening Out!  Tuxedo Rental prices are very reasonable and is of great quality. Everyone their is so friendly, i felt at home. We must support our family owned businesses!

text: Happiness street

text: Fantastic service!!!!

name: Casey Pridgen
text: Bubba's catered my wedding this weekend and I cannot say enough good things. Not only was the food amazing, the service was top notch. I truly felt like royalty. The servers came outside when we were taking pictures and asked everyone if they would like something to drink and came back with armloads of refreshments. Truly caring and professional people and far exceeded my expectations. My guests were all talking the next day about now amazing the caterer was! I would definitely recommend them to everyone.

name: Demetreus Taft
text: Bubba's catered our wedding 10/10/2020 and it was more than we expected! The food was beyond amazing..all of our guests were blown away. They even made sure that the groom and I had food to go. No complaints and I would definitely reccomend them to anyone!

name: Zach and Sam Tyler
text: Our wedding happened in the middle of the COVID-19 pandemic, which ultimately meant going from a 200-person wedding to a 20-person wedding. The team was so accommodating and helped us reimagine a menu that ended up so delicious. I can’t tell you enough about how wonderful our barbecue, mac n’ cheese, potatoes and fruit tasted. On top of that, Stephanie took extra precautions to make sure everyone stayed safe and well fed. I highly recommend.

name: Alison Chatham
text: Prep for the wedding and everything was great. Ray was a great coordinator and really helped us out a ton when understanding what we need for our wedding. I unfortunately have to lower the rating because two specific members of the staff were incredibly rude to us, especially my husband on our wedding day. They forgot to bring out our champagne for all 150 of our guests for the toast. They didn't have any of the cake ready for the guests, we had to awkwardly stand there with no cake for the guests. After both of those occurrences, one of the rude staff members pulled my husband aside and yelled at him for having a terribly scheduled wedding, even though we gave the staff the schedule for weeks early, which we followed. The bartender was very kind, but there were several times where the bar was left unattended and I was having to wait there with a ton of guests to get a drink.  There even came a point where the drinks were left for guests to grab themselves, and some of our guests were taking whole wine bottles... which didnt seem compliant with ABC rules. They did clean up very nicely though, which was very kind since we had to clean up the venue ourselves afterwards.

name: Janet Moore
text: 5-Star all the way!  Bubba's catered our daughter's wedding reception and everything went off without a hitch!  Professionals in every sense of the word; from our first meeting all the way through clean-up.  The food was wonderful and perfect.  We could not be more pleased with Bubba and his team.  A million thanks for absolutely everything you all did!

name: Kyle Hamilton
text: These guys work for you. I've used them for 2 events personally and was extended every curteousy an owner would enjoy. Their venue could use a little updating, but their personnel make up for it. I would recommend these guys to anyone looking to have almost any event catered.

name: Bob Stell
text: Large wedding - everything went perfectly.  Food excellent. Setup and cleanup no problems.  Good job!

name: Melinda Maxwell
text: Bubba recently did our daughter’s wedding.  As always, the food was wonderful and the service great.  Bubba and Josh go the extra mile to please their customers.  I have never seen a more hardworking, customer service oriented caterer.  The food display was also beautiful.  I would highly recommend them for any catering event.

name: David Phillips
text: If I could give negative stars to this caterer I would. I attended a wedding that Silver Spoon worked and the food was suitable only for a prison population and maybe farm animals. The roast beef was pathetic. It resembled cheap deli meat with canned brown gravy poured over the top. The chicken tasted rubbery and was dripping water. The salad was ok (if you like zero nutrition iceberg lettuce) but I'm almost certain they used Kraft store bought dressing. Hello!!! This is someone's wedding reception. Do you have no respect for your work? The food was completely unacceptable. I pray that the parents of the bride got a full refund.

name: Jamie Dodson
text: Great food, wonderful service and competitive pricing. Easy to work with, attentive to our details, and very friendly. Bubba's food was nothing short phenomenal!  Never had better Mac and Cheese or Chicken. The Pork was to die for as were the Brownies. We'll use him again for our next wedding.

name: Ninaplease
text: BEST SERVICE AND FOOD EVER! they catered my wedding and everyone was amazed how good the food is!

name: kay sanders
text: We  had them cater our daughters wedding. We started a year in advance so we could save and get a good idea of cost. They told no need for this just come a couple of days before. Not very comfortable waiting so close I called and confirmed a month prier still trying to get a price. Two weeks before set up meeting to talk. They seemed put off by this but did it. Talked to Ray gave him our totals. He told us his likes such as guess would appreciate tubs of bottle water iced down sitting around sounded good we bought bottle water. He said bottle beer was better less waste so we went that way. He is the professional.  Still no price was set.  Going to e mail it ?  Then he said bring your stuff down two days before anything you dont want to mess with. They really dont mean that. we showed up it was like they had never done it before. We should have set up night before staff was lost.  They were suppose to chill wine and beer all was hot. They had no ice for tea cokes drinks ??? Food was good not sure why they stopped serving before all was feed. We found bags of food in kitchen left. Then the food staff was gone. The bar staff was great trying to deal  food staff was slow but did ok. Left oven on  found that. oh did I mention There was no Ray or Bubba ?? And NO ICE BROUGHT! This is what 3000 got us.

name: Harvey Trussell
text: Great food .And great people.

name: Susan Towry
text: Great chef

name: Kristin Bailey
text: The women at Bella Couture made the wedding dress shopping experience 100% the way it should be!! My friends and I had an amazing experience and I found my dream dress! Thank yall so much for such a great time!

name: Alecia Henninger
text: Great, friendly staff!  Large and affordable selection of wedding dresses!  They made wedding gown shopping a wonderful experience!  My youngest daughter purchased her wedding dress here a couple of months ago and my oldest daughter just made her first and only appointment at Bella Couture!  I would highly recommend Bella Couture!

name: Alese Morgan
text: Marsha and Colleen were so accommodating and eager to help. The dresses at Bella Couture are beautiful with lots of choices. I really enjoyed my experience shopping with them and will recommend to my friends.

name: david lanum
text: We loved our experience with Bella Couture and encourage everyone to start here first. Wonderful variety of dresses and even better service. Our daughter is thrilled with her dress and we can't wait for the wedding. Thank you Bella Couture!!!

name: Breauna Peterson
text: Great experience!  Marsha was a pleasure!  She made sure I was knowledge about each designer whose dress I tried and offered great picks in accordance with my vision.  I will recommend Bella Couture to any future bride!

name: Emily Westray
text: Best experience out of any bridal boutique! Staff was so friendly, and it was so personal. Would 100% recommend them!

name: Nicole Segars
text: They were very helpful & wonderful people to work with, had tons of gown options and affordable prices. Wouldn't recommend anyone else for the experience. I found my dream gown at Bella Couture!

name: Bridget Steele
text: Great experience.  Marsha was so attentive and professional.

name: Pascale Boackle
text: Kristen and Colleen were absolutely amazing! They made me feel right at home the whole time I was there. They were beyond sweet and beyond helpful. I found my dress within an hour and it was my first time going wedding dress shopping ever! If you’re looking for a personable dress-shopping experience with a gorgeous inventory then I most definitely recommend Bella Couture!

name: Prenetia Clark
text:
My experience at Bella Couture was AMAZING!!!! My family is from out of town so it meant a lot to me that they worked with our schedule and allowed us to come on a Sunday! They were so sweet and helpful and I was able to find my DREAM DRESS!!!!!!!!!
Thank you, Bella Couture!

resp.text: Thank you Beautiful Prenetia!! You and your family were so much fun and a joy to have in the store.  Kristen and I both enjoyed helping you find your dream gown.  Your sweet little Princess was a joy!!! I want to see her in 20 years and see the powerful gracious young lady she has become. May God bless and protect you and your sweet family!

name: Jacqui Wickstrom
text: I ordered a sample dress from Michigan without seeing it in person. Jen was very helpful through the entire process! I had tried the dress on at a different shop, so I knew my measurements and they had the exact one here and the price was great. I was nervous about ordering it and having it shipped it across the country, but it arrived in perfect condition. Thanks again for your help, Jen!

name: Kat White
text: Kristin was incredible! We had the place to ourselves since they are by appointment only right now, and she knew exactly what kinds of dresses to pull. They had plenty of options for every budget as well.

name: Ange'l Strong
text: Very fun my daughter was trying on dresses.

name: Cheyenne
text: Avery was amazing in helping me find my wedding dress! I have been shopping for over a year and finally said yes to the dress here. Fantastic customer service and a very personalized experience. I would recommend anyone looking for a wedding dress with any price range to come here! They will go above and beyond to find something that suits your needs!

name: A M
text: Highly recommend Kelsey! We had a wonderful experience with her and my daughter found the perfect dress! She went above and beyond to make this a fun special day.

name: Sarah Gravlee
text: Bella Couture was the first place I tried on dresses. Colleen helped me and she was great. I told her what I wanted and she helped pick some of the dresses out to try on. She was very accommodating and nice!

name: Veronica Waggoner
text: I had a great experience working with Bella Couture! Jen specifically was so amazing through the entire process. She was very professional, helpful, extremely personable, and went above and beyond to assist me in any way she could. Highly recommend them!

name: Vivian Brown Cunningham
text:
Bella Couture has a wonderful selection of gowns. I had a great experience at my first appointment. A very nice, young lady, who was engaged herself, assisted me. She let me try on the dresses I had picked and delivered the style of dresses I was looking for. She was very accommodating to my mother and sister who I had brought with me. We found my dress and I could not have been happier with that first visit. We had a glass of champagne after we decided on it and it was a lovely enjoyable visit.
The owner was there and she was helpful and kind as well. When she saw that I was really leaning towards one, she stepped in and let me know what alterations could be made and we ended up changing the neckline a little bit.
When I went to pick up my dress, we had a different experience. In addition to my mother and sister, I brought a couple of friends along to see me in it. I walked in first, and told the lady at the desk that I had an appointment to pick up my dress. She then began to walk back towards the dressing rooms. I didn't follow her at first because 1. she didn't tell me to and 2. my friends and family weren't all inside the shop yet. When I did take a few steps towards where she went, I saw she had turned around and looked annoyed that I had not followed her.
I put on the dress and she assisted me. After I was in it, I had to ask her if I could go show my friends.
By the time I got out and we looked over my dress, my sister and mother had already noticed how unpleasant the girl helping me was. She made us feel like we were a bother to her.
I enjoyed my first experience tremendously. My second was not so pleasant. The shop is wonderful as long as you do not get the grumpy girl. I wish I had caught her name, but she wasn't friendly enough to tell me and I was too scared of her to ask. I would and do recommend this shop. Hopefully the unpleasant girl has become more friendly.

name: Julia Elaine
text: Love love love this shop.  The most beautiful dresses and kind people!  I am not one who feels comfortable with things trying on clothes and showing people, so I definitely was nervous about wedding dress shopping! Maddie was great helping me pick a dress.  Colleen altered my dress to look exactly how I pictured it and was so patient with me.  The shop itself is beautiful and spacious!

name: kera h
text: I had a great experience at Bella Couture! My consultant went above and beyond to find me my dream dress. I wasn’t fully sure what I wanted, but after telling her some of the things I liked, she pulled out a dress for me that I instantly fell in love with! The rest of the staff was also very friendly. I highly recommend shopping here for your dream dress! You definitely won’t be disappointed.

name: Roya DUNN
text: Very satisfied with the service and variety . Very helpful. I was able to find my perfect dress the very first day I started dress shopping and belle couture was the very first place I visited and only after trying on 2 dresses I found my dream wedding dress. !!!!! ....it was amazing

name: Elizabeth F. Bromley
text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! They are so patient and so helpful. They really want you to find the perfect dress. They didn't push me to purchase a dress just to make a sale, like all the other boutiques I went to tried to do! And they actually listen to what you want and pick dresses that match that! Everyone should make this their first stop in buying their bridal gown!

name: Julie Bowman
text: I love everything about this place! The employees are so sweet, and their gown selection is gorgeous!

name: maria miles
text: Although I did not leave with a dress (at least not yet) I had a wonderful experience at Bella Couture! Everyone made it easy and enjoyable. My mother, sisters and I felt comfortable and under no pressure. I would definitely recommend to any bride!

name: Madelyn Brantley
text: Jen made the day incredible for me. I wasn't expecting to find my dress that day, but with Jen's talent, she found me my dream dress after we realized I wanted something totally different than I originally thought. She found the dress that made me feel like a beautiful bride.

name: Bethany Simpson
text: Loved my experience at Bella Couture! Everyone was super helpful and the owner really listened to what I wanted in a gown. After trying on a few dresses, we were able to find the perfect dress for my big day! I can't say enough good things about Bella Couture!

name: Halie Snider
text: I scheduled and appointment at Bella Couture for a Saturday and they called me immediately to give me the opportunity to come in a week earlier since I was having a short engagement. I walked in and was given the nicest, most helpful consultant! She pulled every dress that I wanted and made the process so enjoyable! My sister and I BOTH found our dress there on our first visit!

name: Beth Dotson
text: Great selection of dresses, and Kelsey was so sweet and very helpful! I had a great experience at Bella Couture!

name: Annamarie Davis
text: I had an amazing time at Bella Couture with my family! Madi made sure to take care of everything we needed and helped reassure that I picked the perfect dress! I could not have picked a better place to go! I highly recommended going to Bella couture to find your perfect dress!

name: Nicolle Cespedes
text: Love Colleen, the owner, and her staff! They truly care about you and about making sure your BIG day is perfect! You cannot go wrong trusting these amazing ladies with your important dress decision.

name: Lori Knarr
text: Bella Couture has beautiful dresses and an absolutely wonderful staff. Leah and Colleen (I think I'm spelling their names right) were super helpful and made my first stop in the dress shopping trip was a very pleasant experience.

name: Leah
text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! I spent over three hours trying on dresses and Carol was exceptionally encouraging and honest about each one. She helped me in and out of every dress and never lost patience with me, even when I wanted to try on the last few two or three more times. I ended up with the dress of my dreams from Bella Couture!! I went in with a pretty tight budget, but Carol was not swayed by that and let us look and was super helpful anyway. I ended up spending more than I anticipated I would, but I couldnt' be happier with my purchase! I also purchased all of my bridesmaids' dresses here. Carol stayed in touch with me throughout my entire wedding planning process letting me know any updates that came up. And when I asked her for about 100 different swatches for bridesmaids dresses, she provided every one. The atmosphere is extremely comfortable and relaxed and inviting. It is such a beautiful boutique with a huge selection, and I am so excited to have found my dress here!

name: Rhonda Lusco
text: Outstanding bridal shop!

name: Dawn Emerson
text:
I LOVED going to Bella Couture to get my wedding gown!!!! Carol was absolutely amazing, as was all of the ladies at the salon. She made the experience exciting and relaxing. I tried on dresses for over 5 hours and not one time did she ever seem tired of working with me or frustrated about me making a decision. She was a lot of fun and it made the entire experience enjoyable. To be honest I was at a bit of a loss going through the racks and picking dresses to try on, but Carol figured me out quite quickly and I followed her around as she suggested dresses for me to try on.
She also helped my mom find a beautiful dress as well. While I have only just ordered my dress, I know that this business genuinely cares about the customer and their services outside of just "here is your dress" make this quite evident as well. I would recommend anyone to go there, it is definitely worth it!!

name: Ja'Lissa Williams
text: CoCo is amazing!! She’s an angel sent from God. Her shop is beautiful. I found my dream dress at her shop. CoCo & the staff made my family and I feel so welcome & loved from the moment we arrived. Make sure you stop by Bella’s Couture if you’re looking for a one of a kind couture dress with top notch service. You will be blessed. CoCo is now known as Momma CoCo to me. I absolutely love her. ❤️

name: Melanie Hinson
text: This place has a great variety of dresses and an incredibly nice staff! Madi helped me; she must be able to read minds because I loved every single one of the dresses she pulled!!! Not a single negative thing about this place.

name: Randi Doherty
text: I don’t know where to start! I had an appt. with them on a day where it snowed around 3 inches... they stayed open just for me!! Once I got there they never made me feel like I was inconveniencing them and never gave me the impression that they wished they were home enjoying the snow or a day off like most other people were getting to do. I found my dream dress and was there for over 2 hours and I never once felt rushed by them!! I can’t express my gratitude and appreciation in words! Thank you so much Bella Couture!! :)

name: Golden Reeves
text: Absolutely loved every part of my experience at Bella Couture! My consultant, Sydney, was extremely sweet and helpful! And they had a huge selection to choose from. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Katie B
text: Fabulous experience at Bella Couture! I highly recommend this bridal salon! Excellent dress selection, prices, and service1

name: Christine Jones
text: Absolutely beautiful dresses with the widest selection I have seen in Birmingham! They carry very unique designers which was perfect for what kind of dress I was looking for. If you’re wanting a unique and stunning dress, highly recommended... if you’re wanting the perfect bridal experience then I’d never walk in the door. Other shops in Birmingham absolutely blow them out of the water when it comes to customer service and creating a bridal experience. My consultant didn’t really say much to me throughout the entire appointment and I did not feel welcome in the slightest. It’s not going to be the tell me about your fiancé and your wedding and about you experience that you get at other salons. If another salon had carried this designer I would’ve have bought my dress somewhere else for sure, but no one else carried the dress so they got my business despite my less than bridal experience.

name: Amanda Klein
text:
I can't say enough good things about Bella Couture! This place should be a must for every bride looking for their perfect gown!

As soon as I arrived at Bella Couture I, along with my mother and future mother-in-law, were warmly welcomed by Carol whom took us through the store explaining to us the way gowns were organized (by designer and price). She knew that I was on a strict budget and made sure to show me what gowns were on sale and how I could get the best pricing. We discussed what style of gown I was interested in (lace, low back, fitted) and began gathering multiple gowns that fit the style of dress I was looking for---and let me just say, that this store as an AMAZING selection of gowns!

Carol helped me with getting into gowns and out of them and was upmost respectful during that whole process. She was very devoted into finding a gown that I loved and that was in my price range. At no point was I pressured to get a more expensive dress or even to purchase a dress that day---which I found quite refreshing, as I like to think about big purchases for a few days! However, what she did once I found "the dress" was just above and beyond! My mom and mother-in-law came up to the platform to see the dress up close... Carol quietly grabbed my mom's camera and started taking multiple pictures of them looking at me in the dress and of us hugging! I now have all of these amazing photos of this amazing experience that I would have never had without Carol! My entire experience was like this, they went above and beyond anything I could have imagined!

We were all so very impressed with the entire staff and the overall store. Amazing dresses at all price points and amazing customer service....you will NOT be disappointed!

So STOP thinking about possibly making an appointment and call them....NOW!

name: Natalie McVey Gossett
text: I was kinda disappointed with Bella Couture. My consultant Emily was the sweetest thing ever and so helpful! But I just felt like that weren't many variety of dresses. Also, it felt a bit awkward to walk across the store from the dressing room to show my family in the waiting area. I had to keep walking behind another bride who was at one mirror showing her family a dress to get to the one they had for me to use. It just wasn't a very intimate setting and I had random strangers giving me opinions on the dresses I tried on. Just not the experience I was hoping for when looking for a wedding dress.

name: Lindsay Norris
text: I LOVE Bella Couture!!! I came by myself and instantly had a family here! Kim and Rachel were so wonderful and helped me find my dream dress which I had no idea what it was!! I couldn't have had a better experience!

name: Kimberly Robinson
text: The best bridal store and staff ever. I love my dress! I love this store. Ms. Colleen and her staff are amazing.

name: Amanda Olive
text: I said YES to the dress today!!!! Thank you so much to the sweet staff at Bella Couture that helped make my day magical!:) I felt like a princess in my dress! I can't wait to marry my fiancé and look so good doing it;)

name: Georgia Tudisco
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE.  THE OWNER AND STAFF ARE AWESOME.  LOVE THEM.  GREAT SELECTION..

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: While choosing my dress from Bella Couture, they were beyond helpful.  However, I felt that the moment I had ordered my dress they didn't care.  It took 10 months for my dress to come in.  I was told it would take up to 9.  When I called to check on it, they said they would let me know.  I had to call 3 different times to see where my dress was.  When I FINALLY got an answer and a new arrival date, they text it to me.  I drove 2 hours from Huntsville, where I live to try my dress on.  It had a 8 foot train and was a wrinkled mess.  I did not feel special trying on my wedding dress.  I didn't even really want to take pictures in it because it was so wrinkled.  When I came back to pick my dress up for my wedding I tried to make an appointment so my maid of honor who was coming from 4 hours away could come with me.  They said no need to call ahead weeks in advance and wouldn't schedule me an appointment.  When my maid of honor and I set a date and I called even days before the recommended "3 days" they told me they couldn't get me in.  I had to pick my wedding dress up completely alone.  I reminded them I would like them to make sure my dress was steamed properly so I could actually see what it looked like.  When I arrived for my appointment, they had just started to steam it...I had to sit by myself and waited 45 mins to try on my sort of steamed dress.  It just felt that once they had my money, they couldn't have made my experience less generic and unimportant.  Wish I would have gotten my bridal gown in Nashville where I got my designer bridesmaid dresses.

name: JulieAnn Wynne
text: Everyone at Bella Couture was extremely nice, patient, and accommodating. If you're looking for formal wear, I definitely recommend making an appointment here.

name: April Barnes
text: Love love my dress!!!!!! The staff was very professional and caring. They had a variety of dresses.

name: Erin Moore
text: Amazing! The staff are all fully dedicated to finding the perfect dress for your wedding. You will walk out with the dress of your dreams and an invaluable, memorable experience!

name: David Morgan
text: Excellent selection. We came in with an appointment and the lady that helped my fiancee really knew her stuff. Great experience overall.

name: Felicia Hackett
text: I love Mrs. Colleen (owner)) she's a wonderful person. The staff is friendly and professional.

name: Carly Bedsole
text: Bella Couture took me from being unsure on the kind of dress I wanted, to helping me find my dream dress! They are so helpful and I had a wonderful experience!

name: Shanta Drake
text: The service was great and they have a beautiful selection of dress. Really made you feel welcomed 😊

name: Laura Marshall-Trice
text: Would recommend this place to anyone!! Kristyn was the best; super helpful, not pushy, complimentary, and patient. Clean place, spacious, and a great variety of dresses!!!

name: Christy Harrison
text: Beautiful shop with friendly staff and reasonably priced dresses

name: A Monica Reads
text: Great service, a little pricey

name: Tom Dowling
text:
My sister is getting married on the 27th of this month.. That's three days away. Everything has gone pretty smoothly, not a ton of stress, and no bridezilla moments, but of course, every smooth trip needs a little storm. My sister ordered her dress from Bella Couture in Birmingham, they seemed helpful enough with picking it out and promised alterations would be done promptly. Up til yesterday, the alterations hadn't been done. Now you might be thinking "well, wedding dresses are tricky to fix in a short amount of time.." , no. It was a simple hem job, and they had six weeks to do it. Six weeks for a simple hem job. And up til yesterday it wasn't done. Fine, alright, you're busy, we get that. But giving her the run around with phonecalls, and promises and then having the audacity to say that my sister is "hysterical" and flat out lying about what you've failed to do, and then charging an extra 550$ on a wedding dress that was already paid for, for simple alterations that weren't even done in the allotted amount of time is disgusting. Oh, story's not done yet, they still won't give her the dress.
So if you're looking to get married anytime soon, don't go to Bella Couture. Despicable service, from a bunch of petty thieves.

name: Brent West
text: Great luxury boutique.

name: K c
text: Top notch!

name: Emily Bergen Copeland Morgan
text: Beautiful gowns and very helpful people

name: Meghan Bledsoe
text: Amazing. Helpful. No pressure.

name: Christina H
text: Wonderful staff and collection

name: Kim Feurtado
text: I booked a massage with my favorite massage therapist which is Jay. He is very sweet and always makes sure that you get your full time. His massages are very relaxing and I he caters to your every need, especially if you have a certain spot that may need more massaging like your back or neck. He is not going to talk during your massage, so you have to make sure that you speak up if you need something.I recommend that if you need a relaxing hot rock massage to go and see Jay, he is AWESOME.

name: Chiante July
text: Jay is an exceptional massage therapist. I can always count on leaving my visits refreshed, relaxed and renewed. He listens to your needs and applies the right amount of pressure to remove any built up tension. He is also very professional, courteous and respectful of your time.

name: Krishalon Abrams-Davis
text: My massage with Jay was awesome. H is always so professional and gives you your full time.  He caters to what you need for your relaxation. I definitely recommend his services. I'm already booked for next month.

name: Tamichael Tyus
text: I love this location. I visited Jay East for my monthly massage and it was so inviting, clean and professional. This location holds variety of services that can cater to anyone needs.

name: Jodi Douglas
text: I get my eyebrows microbladed there with Sarah, and she is the best! She's super friendly and makes me feel super comfortable! I couldn't ask for a better experience!! 1

name: Lisa Duck (Pisces Sun)
text: I received a massage from Jay at Studio 36 Massage he is very professional and leaves me feeling relaxed. I will be returning in the future .

name: Mara Holmes
text: I received a massage from the massage therapist at Studio 36.  T was amazing.  She has a great space very comfortable.  She is very professional .   I would recommend her to anyone and Everyone.  Her transitions are amazing.   I will be back!!!

name: Trey Palmer
text: First post quarantine haircut. Looks good too.

name: Breanna Wagner
text: Best hair and beauty salon!!! Outstanding service!!!!

name: Sadé Miller
text: Great space, great customer service, and great ambiance. Really terrific space. All around great experience! I never leave dissatisfied.

resp.text: We are so pleased you enjoyed your service. Thank you for the review

name: Kim Sweet
text: Had the full works and it's fabulous! Sarah was my esthetician and made me shine bright. Ashlee did my hair and pedicure and made me feel beautiful! I will be back and finally have found my place in Mobile.

name: Arlington show Bryant
text: Netris is the best! Everyone there is so friendly!

name: Caisy CG
text: This salon/day spa is a fantastic place to go for some pampering! Sarah Jenkins did an amazing job on my eyebrows(micro blading) and Sarah Morton made my hair gorgeous!

resp.text: Thanks for visiting Studio 36. We are so glad to hear that you loved your experience. We strive for excellence

name: Michael Driver
text: Very professional , and well done.

name: Krystal WiddaKay
text: I love the privacy of individual rooms

name: Bernadette Jenkins
text: Very nice place. There esthetician Sarah Jenkins is beast!!!!

resp.text: Sarah Jenkins is definitely the best! We love her and we are so glad you loved her as well. Thank you for visiting us and we look forward to seeing you again soon

name: Jeremy Evans
text: Awesome and chic

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Christina Turberville
text: Shoals Event Specialist recently supplied us with tables and chairs for our prom at Muscle Shoals High School.  They did a great job and were very professional and followed through with all of our needs and details.  Thank you for taking such good care of our needs!

resp.text: Thanks Christina!! Y’all were great to work with and we look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Alexis Humphrey
text: AAAAAhhhhhmazing!!!! Sam and Lamarcus knew what to do when to do it. The music was perfect for every part of my wedding. Easy to communicate with and very responsive with email, text, & call. I will diffidently rehire for later events!

name: Deonna Mullins
text: Shoals Event Specialists served us for an outdoor baby shower recently. They did an excellent job! Sam responded within a few minutes each time I reached out! They worked with me to figure out exactly what I needed. Their prices and services are the best! I highly recommend them for all your event needs!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks Deonna!

(Original)
Thanks Deonna!

name: Alyssa Nelson
text: Very professional. Love every thing they do. You should consider them at your next event.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Zach Blenkinsopp
text: Talk about a great company to work with.  Thanks a lot for everything and I look forward to having a long standing relationship with you guys!

resp.text: Thanks Zach!

name: Susan G
text: We rented a tent, tables, chairs and a bar through Shoals Event Specialists this past  weekend.  The price and service were excellent!

resp.text: Thanks Susan! We had a great time and are so happy yall trusted us to handle all of these services.

name: Ruby Page
text:
I hosted a couples wedding shower and planned on around 20 to 25 people. Around 3 in the afternoon on Saturday the day before the shower which was on Sunday. I realized I had totally forgotten about tables and chairs.

I messaged Shoals Event Specialist with my fingers crossed that someone would be available to help since almost all of the other party rental places were closed on the weekend and with it being such short notice, I wasn't holding my breath.

Not only did they answer, but they were very pleasant and helped me figure out how many tables and chairs I would need and delivered everything and picked it all back up after the party.

Shoals Event Specialist truly saved the day!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Blair! It was great meeting you and your family!

name: Amber Edwards
text: I hired them as the DJ for my Wedding two weeks ago and the did not disappoint. The did set up their systems on time and every music they played was wonderful.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Amber! We love getting feedback from satisfied customers.

name: Bentley Sharp
text: These guys did a dance for my sons school. He loved it and told me how nice it was. I will definitely use them for my next event.

resp.text: Thanks Bentley!

name: Ace Eaton
text: Very professional and fun to work with. I’ve enjoyed my experience working with the guys at Shoals Event Specialists. I highly recommend them for all your DJ needs and venue needs for weddings like tents, tables, and chairs.

resp.text: Thanks Ace!

name: Nick Highfield
text: I definitely give these boys a five star rating. But don't let this distract you from the the fact that in 1966, Al Bundy scored four touchdowns in a single game while playing for the Polk High School Panthers in the 1966 city championship game versus Andrew Johnson High School, including the game-winning touchdown in the final seconds against his old nemesis, Bubba "Spare Tire" Dixon.

name: Dustin Coan
text: Very knowledgeable staff who will assist you with rentals for tables, chairs, and linens, staging, lighting, sound re-enforcement, and more!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Thomas Lindsey
text: The party yall DJ'ed that I was at was awesome! Yall did a great job!

name: Andrew Parker
text: these boys played at a Halloween party. They kept playing that fire, and I couldn’t stop dancing.

resp.text: Thanks Andrew!

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
