text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Will Hallman
text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

name: Chris H
text: Cool shop with more than just flowers. They were a great help and put together a nice bouquet last minute.

name: Audra Williams
text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

name: Jn F. Turner
text: I received roses for Valentines day from my husband he was very disappointed at the arrangement looked really cheap and nothing like the picture arrangement he saw online.  You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

name: Senior HelpersNEO
text: I ordered an arrangement from Joy's for the first time a few days ago, and my experience was amazing. The hydrangeas were beautiful and the staff was very helpful. They were able to fulfill my order in a few short hours (for a great price). I highly recommend Joy's, they take great care of their customers, and their flowers are of great quality! You will not be disappointed. Five stars

name: Courtney Moon
text: Ordered an arrangement online for a funeral. Extremely disappointed and shocked when I actually saw the arrangement. Much much smaller in person.  Absolutely wasn't worth the price paid. Would not recommend ordering online. Will not be ordering again.

name: Robert Owens
text: Ok.   Not the warmest reception.   Will try somewhere else next time.

name: Craig Bowman
text: Wonderful experience there

name: Lanicsha W
text: Overall the service from this business was exceptional, I was pleased with both the delivery and the quality of the floral arrangement. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone.

name: Kristen Frost
text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

name: Kayla Rose
text: Beautiful arrangement. Great price. Fast friendly delivery.

name: Viv Pace
text: Very poor customer service skills taking order by phone giving cryptic answers as if uninterested. It's easier to simply go elsewhere.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear this. We will take note of this and make sure to do a better job. I am truly sorry that you were not happy with your experience. If there is anything we can do to make it better, please feel free to call 256-546-6381 and ask for Kristen.

name: Shanell Taylor
text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Nice atmosphere for a floral shop great decor with all kinds of items to decorate your home with. From hand painted vases to a refinished dresser for sale. Lady who worked there was very and helpful. She helped me decide on a bouquet for a friends birthday. Will be back to order more flowers for this Valetines Day!

name: C. Bos
text: We count on Joy's flowers to keep beautiful arrangements on Mom's table for every special day. They accommodate special requests as best they can with the flowers they have. Our mom loves pink. :)

name: Crystal Grochola
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and gift shop. Such wonderful people who work there and overall great prices. I will be using them again. Love Joy's .....

name: Jessie Miller
text: My corsage for prom was horrible put together the rose fell off 30 mins of wearing it (thank god I had done senior lead out already) and the baby breath flow had out even bloomed yet and we paid 36.00$ so I give you  a 1

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that. We will be in touch with you soon in hopes that we can do something to make this better. Is there a name other than Jessie Miller that your order would be under?

name: Jay P
text: This is at least the 4th year I have ordered from Joy's and my sister loves the arrangements and baskets I send her from here.  This time I spoke with Tiffany and she was bright, pleasant and knowledgeable.  We were able for me to visualize a similar arrangement online  My former wife's family was in the flower business here in South Florida for decades and I appreciate good service and great arrangements and Joy's does it extremely well.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Love this shop. I walk in and they know exactly what I want and my name. Recommend highly. They rap the roses anyway I ask.

name: Kathryn Ballard
text: Excellent service, reasonable prices, and high quality in the snack basket that I ordered. I would highly recommend Joy's...

name: Gene Walker
text: I ordered funeral arrangement and it was not delivered even after being told it had been when I checked the morning of service. Then they were suppose to have a plant delivered to the home of the mother of deceased and has been 2 days and still no plant. I live out of state and called the florist (Joys) myself. Will not use nor recommend them ever again.

name: Laura Singleton
text: VERY EASY TO ORDER ONLINE AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED TO GET AN EMAIL ADVISING ONCE ORDER HAD BEEN DELIVERED

name: Kelsey Todd
text: I got an email saying the flowers were delivered to my friend and she never received them. Hoping this will be fixed, but I am very unsatisfied right now. They were delivered after store hours with no way to figure out what happened so I am super upset. :(

name: C.Eric. Holcomb
text: Wonderful place to find the flowers that you want for that special someone.

name: Tonya Mayhall
text: It was so easy to order and when I called the person I spoke with was so nice

name: Colleen Reed
text: My daughter was very happy with her beautiful flowers!

name: Craig Boose
text: Very embarrassed with the pitiful arrangement i ordered.  Never again will I use this florist.

name: ethan johnson
text: Best florist in Etowah County!! Hands down

name: David Stamps
text: One of the best.

name: Terri Webb
text: Love the employees and their work

name: Edwin Smith
text: Joy"s is Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Montez Barker
text: Great gift

name: Regina Vinson Ford
text: Very rude

name: Teisha Johnson
text: Beautiful arrangements and beautiful gifts!!

name: Donna S
text: Great service with fresh flowers

name: ellen todd
text:
Brandon, just wanted to thank you for your fabulous service at my daughter’s wedding. You are such a professional and clearly love what you do! So many of our guests commented on your energy, passion, and gift of creating a fun atmosphere. Sarah and James had the MOST special day, and you played a role in that. I am happy to recommend you to anyone.
Thanks again,
Ellen Todd

name: Jesica Moore
text: High Energy and Simply Amazing! Brandon keeps everyone on the dance floor and he even got out and busted some moves - Brandon was a wonderful emcee too! His dj skills and song choices were on point! He was able to engage all ages with his "hosting" and kept our wedding reception party going! Very smooth/hip and not cheesy at all (we have all encountered those in our lives)! Not to mention, our "photo booth" was so fun for all the guests and very modern/sleek design. We loved our photos from these candid shots - they were hilarious and captured the true spirit of the night! They surprised us with a photo book of all our guests' photos as well - which I LOVE! Brandon is hands down the BEST!

name: Ashlynn Bowman
text: Wow! I don't have enough great words to share about how much fun Ryan Jones at WellDunn Entertainment was at our wedding. He played great music for all age groups to dance too, he knew exactly where to be and when to be there making the experience for the Bride and Groom stress free. If I could do it over again, I wouldn't because the first time was so great with Ryan!

name: Shelly Roark
text: DJ Mason was amazing! He provided professional service and upbeat songs on our playlist that really kept the crowd going! He was very intentional to go over his timeline with us and double check all song requests. He made sure that we were comfortable and on the same page before coming to our reception.  That meant the world to us! We would highly recommend DJ Mason and Welldunn Entertainment to anyone needing dj services!

name: Megan Hays
text: I can not say enough great things about WellDunn Entertainment!! We hired Brandon Dunn as our DJ for both our ceremony and the reception after I saw his services first hand at my best friend's wedding a couple of years ago. We were blown away by how awesome he was! And then our wedding planner (Becky's Brides) recommended him as well, so of course we immediately knew we had to hire him. Needless to say, best. choice. ever!! I have been to weddings with DJs who are not as awesome as Brandon, and you never realize how important the DJ is for the overall vibe and energy of the party until you hear a bad one - haha. Those experiences made me even more thankful that we went with WellDunn because it made all of the difference in the energy of our wedding! Everyone was talking about how awesome Brandon was. He is simply fun and a joy to work with. He is also a genuinely good guy and I can't imagine what our wedding would have been like without him. I was a COVID bride and I was all the more thankful for his empathy and flexibility when we had to postpone our wedding to October. I have to say it was all worth the wait! The highlight of the night was when Brandon let me take over the DJing and the crowd went wild!! Those are some of my favorite pictures from the entire night. Thank you for making our special day and night SO much fun. Everyone kept saying it was the most fun wedding they had ever been to!! <3

name: Kristen Morrison
text: Dj Well Dunn exceeded our wedding expectations! He kept the dance floor full all night and we had so much fun because of him. I can’t recommend him enough! We did the photo booth as well and it was perfect! He made the planning part easy and was responsive to all my questions and concerns. I cannot recommend him enough!

name: Shelley Garson
text: HIRE BRANDON ASAP IF YOU WANT PEOPLE ON THE DANCE FLOOR! He's genuinely the nicest guy and listens to all your requests! We gave him more "dont play this or that" and he crafted the best music for us!! Thank you Brandon for making our wedding SO fun!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Shelley!! Your wedding reception was so much fun. We appreciate you trusting us as your D.J. company

name: Amanda Curvin
text: Brandon was an amazing DJ! He and the whole team at WellDunn were so wonderful, and Brandon made all the difference at the reception. Brandon worked with us to customize our music selections, and he kept the flow and energy up throughout the reception. Truly awesome experience, and I highly recommend him!

name: Kelsey B
text: We went back and forth between a band or DJ for our wedding and I am so glad we went with WellDunn entertainment. Brandon was amazing and really knew how to get all the guests up and dancing! I still have guests telling me that they loved our DJ.

name: Savannah Farrow
text: We LOVED DJ Well Dunn! We used them for our wedding reception and D.J. Mason was so awesome! Everyone had such a great time. Their company was so easy to coordinate and plan with! Would highly recommend and use again!

resp.text: Savannah thank you so much!! We appreciate your feedback and had a great with you and your guests. Thanks again for trusting and choosing WellDunn Entertainment.

name: Jordan Rush
text: DJ Prez was amazing! We had an amazing wedding. He was excellent and really kept the party going. Couldn’t have asked for a better DJ to play at our wedding!

name: Rebecca Cason
text: I’ve known DJ WellDunn since he was playing at Tin Roof in Birmingham, so I knew for my wedding day that I had to have him! Oh man and he did not disappoint!! He got all the guest out there dancing on the dance floor and was even out there with us! I wouldn’t want my wedding day any other way!!

resp.text: Rebecca thank you so much! It was an honor to be your Dj and entertain your guests. So glad to hear your wedding day was amazing. Thank you for trusting WellDunn Entertainment and congratulations again!

name: Delena Nguyen
text: We’re so happy that we hired WellDunn entertainment! D.J. Mason was awesome and everybody loved his energy!! We also got the photobooth service from WellDunn and totally worth it! I loved my template for my pictures and all my guest enjoyed that they got a copy of their photobooth to take home! I will be recommending them to my friends for their weddings or events!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! You should be receiving you “hands on” gallery very soon 🎉 Congratulations again and thank you for choosing and trusting 🅦🅔🅛🅛🅓🅤🅝🅝 🅔🅝🅣.

name: Jada Chubb
text: Book WELLDUNN Entertainment for your next event! - DJ WellDunn knows how to get a party started! He ensured everyone at our wedding reception had a great time by engaging with the crowd. He was extremely professional, organized, and timely. We were so impressed with DJ WellDunn and his team! The online planner option helped make our wedding planning process a breeze! Thank you, WellDunn Entertainment!!

name: Emily Sims
text: If you’re looking for a DJ for your event, look no further!! We had such a great experience from start to finish with Welldunn Entertainment! From the beginning, Callie was so awesome and helped answer my MANY questions! She always answered in a timely manner, and was so nice and helpful with everything! The online planner makes it SO easy to plan and see the entertainment for your event come together! Closer to our wedding, we started communicating with our DJ, Mike Lira. I can’t say enough good things about him either! DJ Mike planned the day and entertainment exactly how I imagined it. He sent over a detailed description of all of the songs and the timeline for when things would be played. He was so organized and easily accessible if I had any questions/concerns. I even had several guests come up to me to say how professional, organized, and friendly our DJ was. We had a few miscommunications in our reception (unrelated to our entertainment); DJ Mike didn’t miss a beat and went right along with the changes being thrown at him. We are so thankful we chose WellDunn Entertainment and would recommend them to anyone!

name: Morgan Todd
text: Michael was a blessing to our perfect day! Always on point with his music choices and the party was always rocking! I will forever suggest WellDunn Entertainment as a wedding DJ and photobooth service. Thank you so much for everything you did!

name: Jaime Thornburg
text: Brandon did a fantastic job at our banquet last night! We had less students due to the COVID19 situation and he kept the party going and negated any weird down time created by the smaller crowd. Our students loved him and so did all the chaperones! I also want to thank Callie in the office who went above and beyond as we had to change our date multiple times when things were shut down so unexpectedly. The photo booth was also a big hit and the custom template they made for us was spot on. Overall we could not have had a better experience and can’t wait to book them again next year!

name: Betsy Terenzi
text: Brandon did such a great job getting the party going at our wedding reception! He did an amazing job of sensing the room and playing the right songs at the right time. He is incredibly friendly, energetic, and interactive with guests! No one will miss having a live band with Brandon leading the party!

resp.text: Betsy thank you so much for your thoughtful review and kind words. We truly enjoyed being your entertainment choice for your wedding reception. Congratulations 🎉

name: Amy Roberts
text: Brandon and his team are nothing short of the best in Birmingham. They're so easy to work with and take the stress out of planning your event. Our students went on about how much they enjoyed the music and had a great time and it was all thanks to WellDunn!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! We truly enjoyed being your entertainment choice for your event

name: Meghan Easterling
text: Went to a friend's wedding where Brandon was the DJ and we had the BEST time! He was really awesome

name: Kyle Mavin
text: Great service - DJ was amazing - kept everyone dancing and entertained - Fun, Easy Going and Knowledgeable during the planning - you need a DJ? WellDunn is the guy to get!

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was our pleasure

name: Tahara Evans
text: Brandon and his crew are awesome to work with.  We have enjoyed both Brandon and Ian at the Hoover Randle Home & Gardens.  Both are professional and interactive.  One of the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much. We enjoy performing at Hoover Randle Home & Gardens anytime

name: Charlie Beth Musgrave
text: Brandon & Brittany were AMAZING! They really connect with teens and is tons of fun!

name: Julie Sasse
text: We love Brandon and WellDunn Entertainment! They really know how to excite the crowd and get everyone dancing!!! My team was so thrilled to have him back at our event for the 2nd year. We can't wait to use him again!

name: Alexis Nicole
text: Our experience with DJWellDunn was beyond amazing! We had DJ Mike and he was the life of the party! He was so easy to work with - quickly responsive to every question we had, extremely flexible, and through all the COVID madness, he stayed positive and worked with us through every change that came our way. His music selection had the crowd on their feet the entire night and kept everyone dancing. When he announced the last song everyone screamed "Noooo!!!" and he played a couple more to ease the crowd haha! Just shows how great of a time he put on for everyone! We absolutely love Mike and are so grateful to have had him be a huge part of our day! I HIGHLY recommend Mike (and DJWellDunn overall) to anyone looking for an amazing DJ and DJ company for any special event!

name: Olivia Stanley
text: Brandon was our wedding dj with WellDunn Entertainment! He was hands down The Best dj I've experienced. My amazing planner hooked me up with him and I felt so lucky he was available on my date. I could not have imagined a different dj! He was loads of fun and interacted with my guests the entire night. He played only the best songs after listening to my plan and my guests requests!! It was a total blast because of WellDunn! Brandon has found his calling. As one bridesmaid said “he’s so much fun, makes you want to be friends with him!” And I have to agree. Nothing but the best. Thank you guys so much.

name: Stephanie Dameron
text: We loved DJ mason for our wedding! It was a great party atmosphere with awesome energy. He is a fun person that drove from out of town to come as well. Great service for a great price!!

name: Emmie Stutts

text: We had Michael Renda as the DJ for my daughter's wedding and he was the greatest!  He was easy to work with and played exactly what the couple wanted. Also if you have doubts about getting the up lighting and cake spots, GET THEM.  It gave the reception a beautiful ambience!  Money well spent - all around,  thank you WellDunn and Michael Renda!

text: Brandon did such an amazing job at our company party! He played great music and helped make our party so much fun. He’s such a professional and the entire process from booking to the end of the party was so easy, I didn’t have to worry about a thing. He’s so friendly and entertaining and you can tell that even though he’s technically working, he’s actually just out there having a great time with the rest of us. The photobooth was FANTASTIC! It was a HUGE hit at our event. Brandon is the BEST and would highly recommend him to anyone. He’ll absolutely be my first call the next time I’m in the market for a DJ.

text: I think I received more compliments from wedding guests about Brandon than almost anything else at our wedding! Brandon is not only professional, kind, and organized, but also has an amazing ability to read the room. This is so important for a DJ! He was able to conjure the perfect mix of songs to please our diverse wedding guest group, knew when to kick things up a notch, and when to give people a breather. He also wore THE MOST amazing white tuxedo to our wedding. Further more, his timing with important songs was spot on (first dance, etc.) and my husband and I felt like rockstars when we entered the reception, thanks to his control of the music. Brandon executes flawlessly and truly feels out what’s best in the moment. He’s also just freaking cool. If you don’t book Brandon, your event is missing out! :)

name: Jocelyn Jimerson
text: Kasey did the Worst sew-in I Have EVER seen I would not have thought it was even possible to do this BAD She did my hair on a Friday and the Next Wednesday I was able to remove the entire hot mess of a sew- in with my hands as the threads started falling from my head that Sunday😡😡😡 Contacted the Salon and her and other staff we're very unprofessional about it! I.WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO ANYONE.

resp.text:
Ms. Jimerson did indeed come in and get a sew in and her extensions were cut and styled as well.She paid a total of $100, a $35 discount for being a new client. When Ms.Jemison left she was satisfied with her service and even allowed after photos. When she called SLB to discuss the issues that she was experiencing , she was told that Kasey would love to take a look at whatever the problem was.In any instance of dissatisfaction we always invite the guest back in as we did in this case. She agreed to return but when she arrived she informed the stylist that she had changed her mind and wanted a refund instead.

The stylist let Ms.Jimerson know that she was not authorized to issue refunds, which she is not, and would escalate this matter to the manager or owner to resolve it further.

Ms. Jimerson refused any further mediation and left disgruntled. She filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau which we are now disputing. At this point, due to her  attempts to discredit our Salon and the unprofessional manner in which she has behaved, we no longer wish to do business with Ms.Jemerson and will not be issuing a refund or a salon credit.

text: This salon is amazing. The staff are very friendly and SKILLED! My hair loves Salon Lisa Brown! I highly recommend this place.

text: I went  to  Salon Lisa Brown about 2 weeks ago.  The staff was very nice and Jamal did my hair with rods.  I love it .  Two weeks later it is still holding.  I love my hair  and he take you at your appointed time. No waiting. Thanks Jamal I will be going back soon.

name: Vanessa Cornelison
text: I was a little anxious about doing a Keratin treatment for my natural hair since I couldn't find a good reference from anyone. I called salon after salon and just didn't feel comfortable paying $400+  to do the treatment just because of my coarser texture. I called Salon Lisa Brown and found not only a reasonable price but an AWESOME stylist (props to Jamal) to tame my mane. He let me know right off the bat that it was formaldehyde free, how things were going to go down and what to expect for aftercare. I was FLOORED once he finished the treatment. I looked like a totally different person and he laid my hair from root to ends, straighter than I've EVER had it!  I will be going back in two weeks to have it properly washed to keep it maintained. Here's my recommendation if you want to take the leap like I did and it come out a success! ( If you're in a salon for "atmosphere" instead of your hair, it's a cool little place ;) but not the Taj Mahal.)

It was asked if I was ok with my hair being cut, I agreed because this was the plan I came in with. It went from that to the still couldn’t be achieved because of the density of my hair. Once this was stated, I decided to tell Ms. Lisa, I don’t think we should waste anymore time, and just end it here. It went from that to No, it’s going to be cute. Long story short, I hated my hair, I made this known before I left and Ms. Lisa stated that she thought I would like it better once my curls flatten out, Well... by the time I woke up they were gone. When I expressed how much I didn’t like it, she did say they guarantee their hair do’s and I could come back or scheduled another appt and they would fix it, but obviously, I probably won’t be taking that offer up for obvious reasons, So definitely a waste of money.

name: Stacey driver
text: My daughter, Summer and her husband Will were married at Adams Acres in February of 2020. They were one of the first few couples to ever be married there! This venue is the absolute best! It is located on private property in a secluded country setting away from high traffic areas giving you a serene and peaceful setting! The sunset pictures at Adam’s Acres are a must because I don’t think you can get a more picture perfect setting. The rustic decor and set up inside and out also make for the perfect background for pictures! The owners go ABOVE AND BEYOND to make your special day perfect!  From the first walk through to the final minutes of the wedding day (clean up time) Brittney Adams, her husband, and their wonderful tribe of helpers were the most gracious and supportive hosts! Brittney and I kept in constant contact from the very beginning! She gave me so much helpful information from how to set up the venue to the best priced insurance coverage to use! She made the stressful things that people don’t always think about when it comes to wedding planning extremely easy! The day of the wedding when we were still decorating, she and her her husband were there willing to move things around, hang things, decorate things, and even loaned us an industrial steamer for the bridesmaids who forgot to steam their dresses beforehand! From beginning to finish  Adams Acres made the entire experience an absolute beautiful memory for everyone involved! We can never thank them enough for making our youngest daughter’s wedding dreams come true!

resp.text: Their wedding was so stunning! Every detail was absolutely perfect! The best part was getting to know you guys! Y’all are so genuine and fun! We had a blast celebrating your daughter!

name: Madison Ingram
text:
I would not recommend this venue if my life depended on it! Do not sign a contract with Adam’s Acres, and do not trust them. Adam’s Acres has been operating for less than a year. I was the first bride to book Adam’s Acres. I booked them when all that Brittany Adam’s had to show was studs and pictures of what it would look like when completed. I took a huge risk and trusted Brittany. Now, I regret that decision.

Due to the COVID shutdowns in March, I was forced to postpone my April wedding. All of the dates I had to choose from included holiday dates or August dates. We picked August 15th thinking that COVID would be over by then. However, COVID-19 cases are worse now than they were in April. After a lot of praying and talking to relatives, a month from our wedding, we made the decision to postpone our wedding again! This is not at all what we wanted to do, but for the safty of our family and friends we felt it was necessary. Brittany, being the heartless person she is, refused to give us another Friday-Saturday date in 2021. She offered a Sunday date with our rehearsal dinner being on a Thursday. That would not work for religious purposes and the fact that we have so many out of town guests.  She said “we would cut into her 2021 revenue if she gave us a Friday-Saturday date”. The only way we would be able to have a Friday-Saturday date is to pay the new 2021 rate of $3500.00 when we have already paid in full of $2500.00. Not only will she not let us postpone to a Friday- Saturday date in 2021, she refuses to give us a refund.

She has stolen our money and has taken advantage of the COVID-19 situation!! Do not book here!! Check out Magnolia Bay, Serendipity, Windmill Station, or The Grand!! Stay clear of Adam’s Acres and Brittany Adams!! Learn from my mistake!

resp.text:
We are so sorry that we were unable to find a compromise that worked for both parties after your cancellation. COVID-19 has been a nightmare for everyone and we understand your frustration.
When the State of Alabama shut down all businesses we rescheduled affected couples. It was heartbreaking for our couples and incredibly difficult for our small business that had been operating less than 6 months. We were so happy to have Fall dates still available, but we will be very honest...it has been difficult trying to recover from all the bookings we lost because of reschedules, especially when we didn't qualify for any assistance. We are thankful that unlike a lot of businesses we were able to survive and didn't have to close our doors.
When we rescheduled you to August 14th/15th, we held that date for you and turned away other couples and parties that contacted us for that date. Unfortunately when you cancel 3 weeks prior, it is impossible to re-book.
We have been open and safely hosting events again since May 30th. Every single couple has been dealing with the uncertainty of COVID and taking precautions to keep everyone safe. We offered to discuss these options with you as well. The mother of the bride tonight told us, "I know it wasn't as big as they planned, but they are finally married and we felt SAFE." Yesterday’s couple rented additional tables to put outside to further socially distance. All weddings have provided masks and had hand-sanitizer readily available. Tonight's bride also live-streamed her event so that her grandmother (who could not attend because of her assisted-living's COVID policies) could watch her get married. Vendors are wearing masks, caterers are hiring extra staff to safely serve everyone, our venue has extra staff at events for sanitizing... Everyone is making compromises and working hard to keep everyone safe.
We are in no way downplaying the seriousness of this virus. We also have no idea when it will end. We understood the reason for your cancellation and although it goes against our cancellation policy, we were empathetic and offered you a Sunday date in 2021 with no additional payments required. When you told us that interfered with your religion, we again offered for a Monday-Thursday. We are so sorry that none of those options worked for you.
Weddings are such an emotional time for everyone and we understand your disappointment. We know that all couples and wedding vendors alike have been thrown into incredibly difficult situations. When what you want to do for your couples conflicts with how you have to run your business--it feels impossible. If we let one person reschedule, we would have to do it for everyone to be fair. We are so sorry, but we simply cannot do that and keep our doors open. We have to follow our cancellation policy in this situation.

name: Yaak18
text:
Updated to include Class Action Lawsuit contact information!

My Daughter scheduled and paid for a wedding. Due to Covid shutdowns ordered by the Alabama Government,  the wedding could not be performed.  It wasn’t my daughter’s fault and it wasn’t Adams Acres fault.  In this case a reasonable person, in other words,  not a crook, would refund the deposit (full payment of $4000) to my daughter.  The owner, Crooked Brittney Adams,  refused to refund the money.  Her contract is iron clad to screw the customer no matter what happens.  She claims to be a Christian and puts off a wholesome,  caring demeanor but In my opinion she’s a scammer just like so many in today’s world.  Don’t trust her! Do not sign a contract with Brittney Adams and don’t give her any money.  She will steal it from you.

Update:  I have been contacted by other disappointed customers of Adams Acres and we are planning a Class Action Lawsuit against this fraudulent business.  If you have been victimized by Brittany Adams please send us an email at AdamsAcresClassActionLawSuit@gmail.com

We have a Dothan Law Firm ready to proceed.

Thank You.

resp.text: We are so thankful that out of the 9 brides affected by COVID at our venue, 8 have them have successfully been rescheduled. Two of those rescheduled weddings have already occurred at our venue since the restrictions were lifted. COVID has created such an unprecedented set of circumstances. While it hasn't been ideal for anyone, we have had open and honest communication throughout the process. Only 1 bride out of those 9 affected refused to communicate with us via phone and requested that communication be only between our attorneys. We honored her request. All brides affected were offered comparable Saturday dates and we even offered to extend those date options into 2021 if they still desired a Spring wedding. For those who were in school-- they were offered dates while school was not in session including dates during the Summer, Fall break dates, Winter break dates, and of course Spring 2021. We always try to work with our brides and their families and will continue to offer alternative dates for the 1 bride who has not yet rescheduled. We know that trying to plan a wedding during COVID has been very difficult and we are here to help with that process as much as we can.

text: I went for the first time to get a Brazilian wax, the woman was very friendly however I have had many Brazilian waxes other places that were great. She did not seem very knowledgeable about what she was doing, she gave me no after care instructions, I’m pretty sure she double dipped the sticks she was using... and worst of all after she was done I was so extremely sticky which has never happened before. She did give me some wax removal lotion to use but honestly it did not really work. I would not recommend this place for waxing as it seemed unprofessional and not to mention unclean. I would recommend European wax center over this place, much more professional, clean, and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Hi Lauren, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We're sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience at our salon. The satisfaction of our guest is our number one priority. We are committed to providing a clean and safe environment. Our therapists have many years of experience. Please reach out to us at (334) 826-3060 and we would be happy to talk.

name: Emily Finck
text: I was very skeptical of waxing until I walked in to very clean spalon, and Manon made me feel immediately at ease.  She walked me through the whole process and now she has been waxing me for over 2 years.  They have a very friendly staff, who are always accommodating to whatever I need done, and now my daughter gets her hair cut there as well!  They offer many services in a relaxing atmosphere, and I would recommend anyone to Ambiance!!

text: I loved Manon.. she is the best! She is very professional. I have been using Ambiance Spalon for my waxing for over 5 years. She is the best in Auburn Al. I love her and her service. Highly recommended!

She has also done all of my facials and I can admit that she has helped control my adult acne and calm down irritation. Joe is wonderful if you need a deep tissue massage. He helped work out tension and aches I have from sitting in a chair all day hunched over a computer. Everyone at the spa is nice and welcoming. text: The staff is very friendly and it is a very clean place. However, I came in to get my eyebrows done and left VERY disappointed in the results. I had to keep myself from crying after I left. I was asked to begin with if I wanted them to be thinned or if I just wanted them cleaned up and I told her that I did not want them thin. Well, they are now extremely thin and they look terrible. I didn’t complain in person, because there was really nothing that could be done. I will definitely not be back though.

name: Abbie Lane
text: I'm  regular with Manon. She's so fast, and does a great job! I've never had a bad experience! I would not go anywhere else. Customer service is GREAT!!!!

name: Emily Daleo
text: I received a certificate for a massage for Christmas and decided to go ahead and schedule the massage. They made the appointment for 3:00 on a Friday. On Wednesday, they called to tell me that they had double booked my appointment, and ask me to come in at a different time on Friday. I was not able to come in at that time, so I had them schedule an appointment for the next Friday at 3:00. When I walked into the spa, I was told that I was not on the schedule. They don't send confirmations of your appointment, and they don't call to remind you of your appointment. Apparently, they really just have trouble booking your appointment at all. Not exactly the kind of experience I want from a spa, and I won't be trying to reschedule again.

resp.text: This was an unfortunate event that we took very seriously. We issued a complete refund of the gift certificate and offered a free 90 minute massage. All clients who are on our schedule receive either a text message or phone call the day before their appointment. We take pride in giving the very best customer service.

name: Valentina Muzaric
text: Colleen is absolutely great. She is putting a lot of thoughts in how to get desired outcome without damaging your hair. She is the one to go to. Everybody is really nice and outgoing.

name: Brandi Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice. I got a Brazilian wax and she made me feel very comfortable, with such a uncomfortable waxing. 😊

name: Alex Woods
text: love all the staff ! Everyone here is very nice , helpful , and professional . 10/10 would recommend !!!

name: Teresa Butler
text: I went to see Matt because of my neck and shoulder pain. He was able to me to be able to move my neck. I always go see him when my hip acts up. Matt is very professional and listens to your concerns. Thanks Matt for great service!

name: Elizabeth Bailey Matson
text: I went to have a trial of my hair and make up and it took 2 hrs for my hair alone and I was not happy with the outcome. I had scheduled to have my hair and make up done, but they had to rush the make up and would have cancelled the trial if I hadn't persisted that I wanted to see the whole picture before my wedding. They hadn't booked enough time from the beginning. I wanted natural looking makeup, but it is caked on and not flattering. I went here after I saw all the positive reviews, but I did not have a positive experience! I'm so glad I tried before my wedding day as the whole thing stressed me out and it's not even the big day!

resp.text: At Ambiance it's our goal to make every Bride feel and look beautiful on her wedding day! During the consultation we strive to find the best hair and make up style with the client for her Big Day. The trial run is very important to us and sometimes it takes longer than anticipated because we want the client to be happy. Therefore, we offer a second complementary trial run! We regret you were not satisfied and we hope you will come back for your complementary trial run to perfect your look.

name: Marina Schroeder
text: I went in for a wax, the facility gives an outward appearance of being very clean and calming, and the employees are all very pleasant, however they double dip the wax! By this I mean they put the same stick that they've put on your body back into the wax (which is not hot enough to kill bacteria that resides on your skin), and unless they change the wax every time a new customer comes in (unlikely, and very expensive), you're getting everyone else's microorganisms on your body, yuck! Not only is this extremely unhygienic and disgusting, it's also illegal. Will not be returning here.

resp.text: Here at Ambiance Spalon we are committed to offering you the cleanest experience in town. We sanitize every room and every utensil after every service. Double dipping is a No No! When you come to Ambiance we guarantee a safe environment for all our customers.

name: Crazy Christy
text: Very nice service very nice salon keep up the good work

name: Jasmine Williams
text: My first time ever getting a Brazilian wax this is where I decide to go; however I waited until I’d gone a few more times before writing this review. They use a special “wax” called Nufree-Finipil which you can research on your own. The facility is very relaxing & clean. Ms. Manon is EXCELLENT! She’s very friendly & will talk to you throughout the wax to keep you distracted. No bumps, no burns from the wax, & no regrowth for at least 2 weeks! Could not have asked for a better experience!!

name: david baker
text: Ive been getting my hair cut by Matthew since I was about 6 years old. Im 24 now and he's the only person I let cut my hair. My cut is called "the usual?". Hand shakes coming and going and always a smile with a good story to follow. All in all, its a quick, enjoyable and quite relaxing experience everytime I go.

name: Sharon Sparks
text: I made an appointment on Valentines Day, Feb 14, 2013. I had never been to Ambiance Spalon before. However, Laura Beth that is a hair & color stylist had done my hair for 8 years when I lived in Rome, Ga from 2003-2011. I was moving to Charleston, Sc and she was moving to Auburn, Al. Although I was excited to be moving to Charleston I wasn't excited about having to find a new hair stylist. Every time she would do my hair when I would get home my husband would always say your hair looks nice. When she was No longer doing my hair it looked nice but I never got the compliments that I use to get when Laura Beth was doing my hair. Every time I would go get my hair done I would think I sure wish Laura Beth was still doing my hair i missed her. My husband started looking for a new job and we found out we were moving to Newnan,Ga. I started thinking, I wonder how far she is from where I was moving to. I got on Mapquest and it was 76 miles. I didn't care, it was worth every mile I drove for her to be doing my hair again. Ambiance is a very nice place and everyone there is very friendly. I met the owners that day and they are really nice. You won't regret going to Ambiance and getting Laura Beth to do your hair. Best decision I ever made to drive 76 miles to get my hair done. Worth every mile.

text: Chassity Bullard is the best hair dresser in town. I have been using her for YEARS. She's worth the 2.5 hour drive from north Alabama!! Thanks girl!! <3

name: Shawn Reaves
text:
WORST SPA EXPERIENCE OR LACK THEREOF THAT I HAVE EVER HAD!!!

I made an appointment for a brazilian wax Friday morning because they had a great web special going for $39, upon which I specifically asked the owner did they do guys and was it ok. The owner said not a problem and let the receptionist make the appointment for Tuesday of the following week. On Monday I get a call around noon and informed they do not do guys and that she was "sorry"....Why did she make the appointment in the first place?

Now I tried to call around Auburn but no one has any appointments open for the the next day on such short notice. Now their policy is to deduct half the price of your service if you give them less than 24 hours notice, yet what do I get when they give me less than 24 hours notice....nothing!!! The point is I counted on them to provide a service that they said they would and now Im left having to travel out of town possible to get waxed.

A word of advice to Ambiance Spalon...if your going to advertise you might want to say no guys or girls only on your ad so in the future this doesnt happen!! And how about reimbursing me for the extra money I had to pay someone else for waxing because I relied on your business.

name: Jessica Turner
text: Tina and her team were amazing to work with and worth EVERY PENNY! After our consultation, my mom and I were very impressed with Tina’s experience, professionalism and thoroughness! It was incredibly easy to make our decision to hire her. Throughout the months of planning, Tina was always a phone call/ text away and always responded promptly. She made the stress of the Bride (myself) and mother of the bride essentially nonexistent (there’s always a little stress we will feel while planning). Her ideas were consistent with trends, which I appreciated very much. She also had a way of making my dreams for my wedding and my mom’s vision come together to be what we both wanted. On the day of our wedding Tina and her team made the day go seamlessly. She made me feel as if I was the only one who mattered and like I was her own daughter whom she wanted everything to go perfect for. Her idea of the candy/ popcorn bar was a complete hit! My guests are still talking about how they loved it!! Tina and Hannah also did a phenomenal job keeping up with our other vendors and making sure everyone was punctual and improvised when the cake arrived damaged (which I had no idea until the end.. thank goodness). I cannot be thankful enough that our paths crossed and she became our coordinator. The relationship she builds with her customers is something that is true and genuine. You will not regret hiring InStyle Weddings & Events for your big day or special event. Thank you Tina, Hannah, Greg and the rest of the crew for all you did for us.

name: Reds Vibe
text: TIna is the BEST! She calmed every nerve and took care of EVERYTHING. She coordinated every vendor and worked with the venue! Tina made sure everything was covered. It was such a huge help and relief! She suggested amazing vendors and worked well with all of them! The wedding went off without a hitch and Tina was the one who made it happen!! She also has great rentals that helped personalize my wedding, they set everything up and took it all down! SO sweet, professional, and helpful!!

resp.text:
Elaine, it was our absolute pleasure to help you create this beautiful memory that you, family and friends will have for a lifetime.

May God Bless You In Your New Life Together.
InStyle Weddings and Events, Planning and Design Services

name: Karen Terry
text: If you want the most beautiful and stress free wedding, you need Miss Tina. She is so kind, thorough, and professional. She is an amazing wedding planner and a wonderful person.

resp.text: Karen and Scott, this makes me so very happy,  that you are happy. What we always strive to remember is this, this one day in your lives you will always remember for a lifetime,. and I want this to truly be “your Best Day ever”.  Congratulations!

name: Mark W. Douglas
text: Tina Murray is fabulous in her work ethic and attention to detail. She will help your day Shine like you Dreamed it would! Highly Recommend!

name: chattfiremike
text: Tina Murray and her team at In Style Weddings are amazing!!! They were so responsive and accommodating, always providing feedback for any question, big or small, and always went out of their way to make sure everything for my wedding was taken care of. Lecia, my day of coordinator, made sure that all of the décor for the reception was taken care of two days in advance and set everything out-it looked absolutely gorgeous. Everything she did relieved me and my mom of so much day-of stress. Hannah, my bride's assistant, was at my side during all of the pictures before the ceremony, holding my flowers when I needed help with my dress, adjusting my train, pinning my hair back and making sure my veil was in place at all times. She was truly a lifesaver and made it so easy for me to enjoy taking pictures and had everything you could possibly need from bobbie pins, to a mirror, to a glass of water. Tina is extremely honest and straight forward, which I LOVE. I always felt that she had my best interest in mind and would give me the best advice so I could make decisions regarding all aspects of the wedding. I am not from Chattanooga, so I had questions about almost every vendor and she never steered me wrong. She was so much fun to get to know and from the beginning, I felt at ease with her, knowing she was going to be on top of everything for the reception. Since I had a church ceremony, she did not coordinate for that, but she made sure to know all of the details and really took my vision and made it a reality for the entire event. If you are looking for a coordinator, and don't want to spend a fortune, In Style Weddings is the way to go. They do not sacrifice professionalism or quality of service, they are extremely helpful, can fit into almost any bride's budget, and are absolutely worth every penny for the peace of mind they provide! I am so thankful to have had Tina and her team help make my wedding day perfect for my husband and me!

name: Paige Pertuit
text: I cannot say enough nice things about Tina and Lecia. We originally were not going to hire a planner because we thought we had everything under control, but I'm SO glad we did. It saved my mom and I so much stress the day of. Lecia went above and beyond. My wedding would not have been near as great without her. She is so sweet, professional, and really knows her stuff! Thank you for everything!

name: Ashley Tesfaye
text: I am not even sure where to start. Axel's work speaks for itself. From the moment I laid eyes on a video he created, I knew I wanted him to be the one to capture our wedding day. Axel is extremely professional and quick to respond to all emails and communication. We, unfortunately, had to make many adjustments to our wedding plans due to Covid, and Axel didn't hesitate to problem solve, change plans, and be available for us when we needed him. Not only is he an amazing person, he is an exceptional videographer. He captured the entire essence of our wedding day. He got to know us and he made sure to capture all of the big and small moments and then seamlessly integrated them into our gorgeous highlight video. I have already watched it more times than I can count, and I can guarantee it will be something we talk about for years to come. Not only did Axel capture our micro-wedding, we have him booked for next year to capture our large vow renewal and reception. There is nobody better for the job and I can't recommend him enough! You will not regret hiring him for any of your video needs!

name: Tali Mize
text: Axel is such an amazing videographer! He captured our wedding beautifully and made the video romantic, sweet, and fun. He was so punctual with all phone calls, plans, and on wedding day. He really listened to everything we wanted and executed it perfectly! Highly recommend for your wedding

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Tali! I really enjoyed shooting your wedding and thank you guys so much for trusting me!

name: Natalie Wilson
text: Having Axel to capture our wedding day is the one thing I am most thankful for. He is so kind and fun to work with. I cannot recommend him and his services enough.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Natalie! It was so great working with you and Scott and I hope you guys are doing well

He made my husband and Is vision come to life, and was so patient with all our requests! If you choose Axel Marshall Productions, you’re choosing perfection and you won’t regret it!!!

resp.text: Reading this brings the biggest smile to my face Tori! Thank you so much for the kind words and incredible review! You and Nick both were a joy to work with and your wedding was absolutely perfect. Thank you to much for the opportunity to shoot your wedding and play a small role in such a monumental day!

resp.text: Thank you so much Josh! I absolutely love working with you and I look forward to ore projects in the future!

text: I almost never review, but I was so moved by the ladies at Cullman Florist that it seemed wrong not to! These ladies went the extra mile in not only finding some for me, but creating a lovely arrangement that my parents are still enjoying almost a week later. Thank you so much to everyone involved in creating a special moment for my parents and myself. You are awesome.

They were not delivered on the 10th, we spoke to her. They were delivered on the 11th, Monday afternoon. I did write my complaint to where I ordered online soon after the delivery. Noone contacted me!

resp.text: I honestly wish I would have known of the issue closer to then but a year later I can only see what I have on record. The family was all gathered in Hanceville when the Flowers were presented. The entire family was just simply amazed. The Silver Cross Vase was spectacular,the flowers were professionally arranged and bold. I was told the Flowers could be smelled in the next room. To all that's reading this post, if you want something special done look no further, Cullman Florist will make it rememberable. Again Thank you so much for putting a smile on so many broken hearts.

resp.text: I pulled your order first thing this morning. This was 5 months ago. You picked your order up from our store. If it was not what you wanted or expected we would have gladly fixed it had we known then that you were not happy. Your order was for 6 red Rose's wrapped in paper with writing on it. Your order was not exactly like either picture you sent us because you wanted two seperate pictures combined. I still have the text messages on my cell phone where we texted back and forth several times. In the future where ever you order flowers from I would suggest communicating with them if you are not pleased closer to when the order is placed instead of waiting 5 months. We will always correct anything if we are given the chance. Even on our busiest day of the year each order is important to us. Thank you Steph Cook Cullman Florist Co-manager

name: Marie Hughey
text: Everything about our experience was amazing. We had our wedding here on April 10th and it was everything I ever wanted. Cody, Elizabeth, and the whole Oak Island Team were amazing! It is a great venue for anyone looking to get married on the lake. It is truly a venue only so you're able to choose all your own vendors rather than having to use the provided vendors as it is with some venues. We had our rehearsal dinner at the mansion Friday night and the entire wedding party was able to stay both Friday and Saturday which made thing so easy! I would absolutely, 100% recommend this venue for any wedding or event!

The house itself is very beautiful inside and out. It such a unique venue, which made our wedding even more special.  Everyone that is part of the Oak Island team was wonderful! They all worked well with us and  helped us in any way they can. Thank you for making our day extra special with your hospitality. I definitely recommend this venue to any brides looking for a unique and beautiful venue.

text: I did not end up booking Oak Island Mansion as my wedding venue, but they were the first venue I contacted for information/scheduling a tour. Though this wasn't my perfect venue just based on my wedding vision, I would recommend it to any bride looking for a flexible, classy, Southern event that will be sure to delight their guests!

If there's anything we can assist you with in the future please don't hesitate to reach out anytime.  Congratulations to you both!  We wish you all the best!  :)

Elizabeth is the main owner I dealt with and while she was nice on the initial tour she would not respond to any texts or calls after we paid our deposit and we had to end up getting on touch with some of the other owners who were very nice. She was very rude on the wedding day. After the wedding, the caterer was boxing up food and Elizabeth (the owner) asked for a plate and after our caterer told her she would have to ask my mom because we paid for all the food she proceeded to just help herself to our leftover food. If you’re a bride and want a helpful venue owner who is responsive and not have to worry about everything being good then this is not the place for you. It’s a shame though because the venue itself is gorgeous.

Very very disappointed and had already printed and sent save the date cards!!!  Never been treated so badly by anyone before in my life.  Stealing money from people is a crime!!!! DO NOT USE!!!! They still owe me money.

name: Megan Hoehn
text:
ABSOLUTELY PERFECT WEDDING DAY!!
When looking for a venue in a town we were unfamiliar with, finding Yolanda and her staff was a god-send. We wanted to avoid the "wedding nightmares" you hear about with vendors falling through or ripping you off or all of the above and we chose wisely. We visited the venue and after meeting Yolanda, we immediately said “this is the one”. We looked no further and this is the only venue we visited. It is as beautiful in person as you see in the many photos on their website and in other bride's pictures. I cannot wait to get our pictures/videos back. It is a family owned business and quite reasonable in the grand scheme of average wedding costs. We had unlimited contact and visits with all staff. We moved to the south a year before getting engaged and decided to have everyone come down to us for a good ol’ southern wedding. The logistics were overwhelming and Yolanda, Candace and Terri were wonderful in making sure everyone was picked up, transported and generally accommodated. They take care of all the major details so for a detail-oriented person like me, it was great because I had time to craft my own little personal touches. We rented out the mansion for the immediate families and wedding party to spend the night with their guests and when we pulled up, we got nothing less than Ooos and Ahhs about how beautiful and serene it all is. Every vendor Yolanda has in her arsenal is remarkable and a joy to work with - she wouldn't have it any other way and that is how you know you're looking at the right venue/planner. The day-of coordinator (Terri) is a MUST-DO for Brides. We actually ate at our wedding! We had our first meal as husband and wife and no one even knew and just assumed the wedding norm ( that you don’t get to eat the delicious food you hand-selected!) It was absolutely incredible. Everyone was so surprised that she answered all of their questions, let them do whatever they wanted within reason and even partied and had a blast with us. You will not find a more flexible venue/planner anywhere. There were bridesmaid's guests that were not a part of the wedding party and while we were off taking pictures or getting ready, she let them hang out, swim in the pool and generally do whatever as if they were at their own homes. In terms of the wedding, she was willing to go above and beyond to make the day special for us. She found us the perfect officiant who let us do a cultural element as part of our ceremony – something they were equally as excited to see executed. We wanted to light off lanterns at the end of the night and she said absolutely. Nothing was out of the realm of possibilities or "against the rules" and that is how your wedding day should be - exactly as you want. Everywhere else we looked there was a “No-no” list of things you cannot do – be out by 11, no open flames, no loud music, etc etc. That list does not exist at Oak Island and they will try to accommodate all of your requests within reason.

If you are looking for a one of a kind wedding experience with seasoned professionals, listen to their advice (they've done way more weddings than you!) and go with Oak Island Weddings. We could not have been happier with our choice.
